Question: taip askrpt main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo mnslk fharst main nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، aur astyk klas jo astyk ko nafza karnay kay liye is nwda klas ka astamal krta haay۔astyk klas main ayk aaly wsaf hona chahaiay jo astyk kay awpry hasaay ki taraf asharha krta hay (yany lnkda fharst main pehla nwda)۔ksy shay ko astyk par dhkylnay kay l we ، hum dyiay gaye aaitm kay sath ayk nya nwda tyar karty hain aur is ka aghla pwaintr astyk kay mwjwdha upar par syt karty hayn۔as kay bad hum nay astyk kay awpry hasaay ko niay nwda par syt kya ، aur isy mؤsar tarykay sy astyk ka nya upar bna dya۔ksy aaitm ko astyk sy pap karnay kay l we ، hum lst main aghlay nwda par astyk kay awpry hasaay ko trtyb dy kar lnkda lst sy pehla nwda nkal dytay hain (yany ، nwda nay mwjwdha upar ki taraf asharha kya haay) 1. hr ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamdtaip askrpt main lnkda fharst ka astamal karty hoey astyk ky: taip askrpt klas nwda <t> {dayta: ty ؛aghla: nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (dayta: ty) {this.data = dayta ؛this.next = null ؛}} klas astyk <t> {awpr: nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.top = null ؛} psh (dayta: ty): batal {kanst nwda = nya nwda (dayta) ؛node.next = this.top ؛this.top = nwda ؛} pap (): ty |null {if (! this.top) {waps NULL ؛} kans dayta = this.top.data ؛this.top = this.top.next ؛dayta dayta ؛} jhanknay (): t |null {if (! this.top) {waps NULL ؛this is ko waps kryn۔} isempty (): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ tap === null ؛} saiza (): nmbr {aaiyay ghnty = 0 ؛aaiyay mwjwdha = this.top ؛jbkha (mwjwdha) {ghnty ++ ؛mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ nykst ؛} wapsy ki ghnty ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par USEAGECONST astyk = nya astyk <nmbr> () ؛ astyk.psh (1) ؛ astyk.psh (2) ؛ astyk.psh (3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (astyk.pp ()) ؛// 3console.log (stack.peek ()) ؛// 2console.log (stack.isempty ()) ؛// falseconsole.log (stack.size ()) ؛// 2 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain js main dayta wsaf aur aghly wsaf hay jo lnkda fharst main aghlay nwda ki taraf asharha krta haay۔ham ayk astyk klas ki bhi wzuahat karty hain js main ayk tap wsaf hawta hay jo astyk kay awpry hasaay ki taraf asharha krta haay۔psh () ka tarykha dyiay gaye aadad wa shmar kay sath ayk nya nwda tyar krta hay aur is ka aghla pwaintr astyk kay mwjwdha awpry hasaay par syt krta haay۔pap () ka tarykha astyk sy upar waly nwda ko hata dyta hay aur is ka dayta lwtata haay۔jhanknay wala () tarykha upar nwda ka dayta isy hataiay baghair lwtata haay۔aghr astyk khaly hay tou isempty () ka tarykha chyk krta haay۔saiza () ka tarykha astyk main nwdas ki tadad lwtata haay۔aakhr main ، hum ayk nya astyk msaal tyar karty hain ، is par kuch akdar ko aaghay brahatay hain ، aur is ki faalyt ko zaahar karnay kay liye is kay kuch tarykwn ko kal karty hayn۔

Question: ayk prwghram lkhyn takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh aya bainry ka drkht taip askrpt main mtwazan bainry srch try hay ya nhayn۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya bainry ka drkht taip askrpt main mtwazan bainry srch drkht hay ، hamain yeh chyk karnay ki zurwrt hay keh aya kesi bhi nwda par baien aur dien sbtry ki awnchaiy kay darmiyan mtalk frk 1 sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ، aur agar dono baien aur dono kay brabr haay۔daiyn sbtryza khud mtwazan bainry drkht hayn۔ is par aml draamd karnay ka ayk tarykha yeh hay keh ayk bar bar chlnay wali tkryb ki wzuahat ki jaye jo nwda ko ayk dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur is nwda par jraay hoey sab try ki awnchaiy ko lwtata haay۔fnkshn ko pehlay yeh chyk karna chahaiay keh aya nwda kaladm hay ، is sawrt main awnchaiy 0 haay۔ bsawrt dyghr ، isy baien aur dien sab trywn ki awnchaiywn ki bar bar ghnty karni chahaiay ، aur chyk karna chahaiay keh woh mtwazan hain aur un ka mtalk frk kam ya is kay brabr hay ya is kay brabr hay ya nhayn۔1. agar dono zayly zayly mtwazan hain tou ، fnkshn ko mwjwdha nwda par jray hui sab try ki awnchaiy ko waps karna chahaiay ، jo is kay baien aur dien sab trywn ki awnchaiywn ki zayada sy zayada haay۔1 is bat ki nshandhay karnay kay liye keh pora drkht ghair mtwazan haay۔ yahan kesi fnkshn ki ayk msaal kay nfaza ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya bainry drkht taip askrpt main mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht haay: taip askrpt klas trynywda <t> {wyl: ty ؛baiyn: Treenode <T> |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (wyl: ty) {this.val = wyl ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} fnkshn isbalanced (jra: trynwda <kwiy bhy> | null): bwlyn {fnkshn ghythait (nwda: trynwda <kwiy bhy> | null): nmbr {aghr (! nwda) {waps 0 ؛} kwnst lyft haait = getheight (node.left) ؛kanst rait haait = ghythait (nwda. rait) ؛if (liftheight === -1 || rightight === -1 || math.abs (liftheight -rightight)> 1) {wapsy -1 ؛math ryazuy ki wapsy۔ myks (lyf lait ، rait haait) + 1 ؛get ghyt haait (jra)! == -1 ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk wyl wsaf aur baien aur dien safat kay sath ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo baltrtyb baien aur dien bchwn kay nwdas ki taraf asharha karty hayn۔ham ayk mtwazan fnkshn ki bhi wzuahat karty hain jo trynwda msaal kay tawr par ayk dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur ayk bwlyn ko lwtata hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya is nwda par jraa hoa drkht mtwazan bainry tlash ka drkht haay۔aaiy ays bylns fnkshn ayk ghhwnslay waly ghyt nait fnkshn ko kehty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par trynwda msaal lyta hay aur is nwda par jray hui sab try ki awnchaiy ko lwtata hay ، ya agar sab try ghair mtwazan haay۔jyt lait fnkshn pehlay janch pratal krta hay agar nwda kaladm hay ، is sawrt main awnchaiy 0 haay۔ bsawrt dyghr ، yeh bar bar baien aur dien sbtryza ki awnchaiywn ki ghnty krta hay ، aur chyk krta hay keh aya woh mtwazan hain aur un ka mtalk frk 1 sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ya is kay brabr haay۔. agar dono zayly zayly mtwazan hain tou ، fnkshn mwjwdha nwda par jraay hoey sab try ki awnchaiy ko lwtata hay ، jo is kay baien aur dien sab trywn ki awnchaiywn ki zayada sy zayada haay۔kha pora drkht ghair mtwazan haay۔aakhr main ، agar rwt nwda ki awnchaiy -1 nahin hay tou ، isblanced fnkshn drst lwtta hay ، js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh pora drkht mtwazan hay ، aur ghalat haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main do astyks ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main do astykwn ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: do astyk ، astyk 1 aur astyk 2 bnaiyn۔ ansar ko khtm karnay kay l stac ، isy astyk 1 par dbaiyn۔ ansar ko day kywiw karnay kay l. ، agar astyk 2 khaly nahin hay tou ، pap ayn ko pap kryn۔astyk 2 sy ansar aur isy lwtaiyn۔bsawrt dyghr ، jabky astyk 1 khaly nahin hay ، astyk 1 sy kesi ansar ko pap karain aur isy astyk 2 par dbaiyn۔phr astyk 2 sy kesi ansar ko pap karain aur isy waps krdyn۔ yahan taip askrpt main do astykwn ka astamal karty hoey ktaar kay dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt klas ktaar <t> {njy astyk 1: ty [] = [] ؛njy astyk 2: t [] = [] ؛enqueue (aaitm: t): batal {this.stack1.push (aaitm) ؛} dequeue (): t |ghyr mtaynha {aghr (this.stack2.length === 0) {jbkha (this.stack1.length> 0) {this.stack2.push (this.stack1.pop ()!) ؛}} this.stack2.pop () waps karain ؛} saiza (): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔ astyk 1.length + this.stack2.length ؛} isempty (): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ saiza () === 0 ؛}} // msaal kay tawr par usageconst ktaar = niy ktaar <nmbr> () ؛ ktaar۔ enqueue (1) ؛ ktaar۔ enqueue (2) ؛ ktaar. enqueue (3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ktaar.Dequeue ()) ؛// 1console.log (ktaar.Dequeue ()) ؛// 2console.log (ktaar۔ aaiysty ()) ؛// falseconsole.log (ktaar. saiza ()) ؛// 1 main yeh msaal ، hum do njy astyk ، astyk 1 aur astyk 2 kay sath ayk ktaar klas ki wzuahat karty hayn۔Enqueue () ka tarykha kesi shay ko astyk 1 par dhkyl dyta haay۔daykyw () ka tarykha chyk krta hay keh agar astyk 2 khaly nahin hay ، aur agar aysa hay tou ، astyk 2 sy ansar ko pap krta hay aur isy lwtata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، yeh astyk 1 sy tamam anasar ko pap krta hay aur inhain astyk 2 par dhkyl dyta hay ، aur phir astyk 2 sy ansar ko pap krta hay aur isy lwtata haay۔saiza () ka tarykha ktaar main mwjwd anasar ki kal tadad lwtata hay ، jo astyk 1 aur astyk 2 ki lmbaiy ka mjmwaha haay۔isempty () tarykha chyk krta hay keh aya ktaar khaly hay ya nahin janch kar kay keh aya is ka saiza 0 haay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey strngh main alfaza ki trtyb ko alta karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tar main alfaza ki trtyb ko pltanay kay l we ، hum tar ko alfaza ki saf main tksym karnay kay liye asplt () ka tarykha astamal krsktay hain ، phir saf main alfaza ki trtyb ko alt karnay kay liye alt () tarykha astamal krsktay hain ، aur aakhr mynalfaza ko strngh 12 main shaml karnay kay liye jwain () ka tarykha astamal kryn۔('') ؛alfaza ki wapsy۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay un pt strngh ko alfaza ki ayk saf main tksym krta hay js main asplt () kay tarykha kar ko kesi jghha kay sath daymymtr ki haysayt sy astamal kya jata haay۔as kay bad yeh alt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey saf main alfaza ki trtyb ko tbdyl krta hay ، aur aakhr kar alfaza ko ayk jghha kay sath jwain () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey strngh main shaml krta haay۔ yahan rywrswrdaza fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: taip askrptkwnststr = 'haylw wrlda' ؛ kanst alt = rywrswrdaza (str) ؛ knswl.lwgh (alt) ؛// 'wrlda haylw' is msaal kay tawr par ، hum 'haylw wrlda' ki kdr kay sath ayk nya strngh STR tyar karty hayn۔as kay bad hum STR kay sath rywrswrdaza fnkshn ko dlyl kay tawr par kehty hain aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr ko alt dytay hayn۔aakhr main ، hum knswl main alt ki kymt ko lagh un karty hain ، jo 'wrlda haylw' hona chahaiay۔

Question: taip askrpt main ayk kam sy kam myks hayp dayta dahanchha nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main kam sy kam myks hayp dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye bohat sary wsail dstyab hayn۔ayk nktaha nzar bainry hayp ka astamal karna hay ، jo drkhtwn ki tarah ka dayta dahanchha hay jo hayp praprty 1 ko mtamin krta haay۔bainry hayp ko ayk saf kay tawr par nafza kya jaskta hay ، jahan drkht ki jra andayks 0 par hay ، aur andayks I main nwda kay baien aur dien bchay baltrtyb 2i+1 aur 2i+2 andayks main hayn۔ ayk mnt ko nafza karnay kay liay۔-myks hayp ، hum dahyr kay kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye bainry hayp srny ka astamal krsktay hayn۔khasa tawr par ، hum srny (1 ، 3 ، 5 ، wghyrha) kay ajyb asharay main kam sy kam anasar aur srny (0 ، 2 ، 4 ، 4 ، wghyrha) kay yahan tak keh zayada sy zayada anasar ko astwr krsktay hayn۔as sy hamain dahyr kay kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada anasar dono ko mwsar andaza main rsaiy haasal karnay aur ayntryshnza aur daylyt 2 kay doran zurwrt kay mtaabk anasar ko tbdyl krkay hayp praprty ko brkrar rkhnay ki ajazat mlty haay۔ yahan bainry hayp srny ka astamal karty hoey ayk kam myks hayp dayta dahanchay ka ayk msaal aml haay۔taip askrpt: taip askrpt klas mn myk haap <t> {njy hayp: ty [] = [] ؛njy getParentIndex (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {rytrn myth.flwr ((andayks - 1) / 2) ؛} njy getMinChildIndex (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {kanstyt lyftailda andayks = 2 * andayks + 1 ؛kwnt raitchlda andayks = 2 * andayks + 2 ؛aghr (baiyn taraf sy index> = this.heap.length) {wapsy -1 ؛} agar (raitchlda andayks> = this.heap.length) {waps baien taraf kyndayks ؛this is ko waps kryn۔lyftaidaaida andayks: dien bchay ki andayks ؛} njy ghyt mykschlda andayks (andayks: nmbr): nmbr {kwnt lyftaida andayks = 2 * andayks + 1 ؛kwnt raitchlda andayks = 2 * andayks + 2 ؛aghr (baiyn taraf sy index> = this.heap.length) {wapsy -1 ؛} agar (raitchlda andayks> = this.heap.length) {waps baien taraf kyndayks ؛this is ko waps kryn۔lyftaidaaida andayks: dien bchay ki andayks ؛} njy blblap (andayks: nmbr): batal {const isminlevel = math.floor (math.log2 (andayks + 1)) ٪ 2 === 0 ؛if (index === 0 ||this.getParentIndex (andayks)])) {wapsy ؛} CONT pyrnt andayks = this.getParentIndex (andayks) ؛const temp = this.heap [andayks] ؛this.heap [index] = this.heap [pyrnt andayks] ؛this.heap [parentindex] = aarzuy ؛this.bbbleup (pyrnt andayks) ؛} njy blblydaaؤn (andayks: nmbr): batal {kanst isminlevel = math.floor (math.log2 (index + 1)) ٪ 2 === 0 ؛Const MinChildIndex = this.getminchildindex (andayks) ؛kanst mykschlda andayks = this.getMaxChild index (andayks) ؛if (mindidedex === -1) {wapsy ؛target targhtaidaaida andayks = mnychlda andayks dyn ؛aghr (! isminlevel && mykschlda andayks! == -1 && is myn۔} if ((isminlevel && this.heap [index] <= this.heap [targetchildindex])} const temp = this.heap [andayks] ؛this.heap [index] = this.heap [targhtaidaaida andayks] ؛this.heap [targetChildindex] = aarzuy ؛this.bubbledown (targhtchlda andayks) ؛} dakhl karain (aaitm: ty): batal {this.heap.push (aaitm) ؛this.bubbleup (this.heap.length - 1) ؛} daylytymyn (): ty |ghyr wzuahaty {aghr (this.heap.length === 0) {ghyr wazuha shuda waps ؛} const min = this.heap [0] ؛this.heap [0] = this.heap.pop () !؛this.bbbledown (0) ؛wapsy mnt ؛} daylytymyks (): ty |ghyr wzuahaty {aghr (this.heap.length === 0) {ghyr wazuha shuda waps ؛} kanst myks andayks = this.heap [1]> this.heap [2]؟1: 2 ؛kanst myks = this.heap [myks andayks] ؛this.heap [myks andayks] = this.heap.pop () !؛this.bbbledown (myks andayks) ؛zayadha sy zayada wapsy ؛} getmin (): t |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔this.heap [0]: ghair wzuahaty ؛} getMax (): t |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔(this.heap [1]> this.heap [2]؟ this.heap [1]: this.heap [2]): ghair mtaynha ؛} saiza (): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔} isempty (): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ saiza () === 0 ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk mn myk haap klas ki wzuahat karty hain js main njy hayp srny hawty hay jo dahyr kay anasar ko mhafwza krty haay۔klas hayp kay anasar tak rsaiy aur un main hayra phyry karnay kay liye mtadd njy mddghar tarykwn ki bhi wzuahat krta haay۔getParentIndex () ka tarykha kesi dyiay gaye nwda kay waldyn nwda ka andayks lwtata haay۔getminchildindex () aur getMaxChild index () kay tarykay kesi dyiay gaye nwda kay baltrtyb kam sy kam aur zayada sy zayada chailda nwdas ka andayks lwtatay hayn۔blblap () tarykha kar sy bar bar tbadlha hawta hay

Question: taip askrpt main do dawrwn kay mabyn sab sy tawyl aam hasawl tlash karnay kay liye ayk fnkshn lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main do dawrwn kay mabyn sab sy tawyl aam mshtrkha hasawl tlash karnay kay l we ، hum O (Mn) wkt main msilay ko hal karnay kay liye mthark prwghramngh ka astamal krsktay hain ، jahan M aur N dono astrnghza 12 ki lmbaiy hayn۔bnyady khyal yeh hay keh saiza (M+1) X (n+1) ki do jhaty saf DP bnana hay ، jahan DP [i] [j] pehlay kay pehlay I harfwn kay darmiyan sab sy tawyl aam mshtrkha ki lmbaiy ki nmaindghy krta haay۔strngh aur dusray tar kay pehlay jay krdar۔as kay bad hum mndrjha zayl tkrar kay rshtay ka astamal karty hoey srny day py ko pُr krsktay hayn: day py [i] [j] = 0 ، agar i = 0 ya j = 0dp [i] [j] = dp [i-1] [J-1]+ 1 ، agar S1 [I-1] = S2 [J-1] DP [i] [J] = zayada sy zayada (DP [I-1] [J] ، DP [I] [J-1]) ، dusri sawrt main ، dusri sawrt main ،S1 aur S2 do un pt dawr hain ، aur zayada sy zayada () ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo apnay do dlail main sy zayada sy zayada lwtata haay۔phala maamlha bys kys ki nmaindghy krta hay ، jahan sab sy tawyl aam mshtrkha hasaay ki lmbaiy 0 hawty hay agar koi tar khaly haw۔dwsra maamlha is maamlay ki nmaindghy krta hay jahan dono astrnghza kay aakhry harwf mych hawtay hain ، is maamlay main hum sab sy tawyl arsaay sy mshtrkha hasawl ko 1 tak braha saktay hayn۔ tesra maamlha is maamlay ki nmaindghy krta hay jahan dono dawrwn kay aakhry krdar mmasal nahin hawtay hain ، js maamlay main hamain zurwrt haay۔ayk tar kay aakhry krdar kay sath do dawrwn kay sab sy tawyl arsaay sy aam hasawl ki lmbaiy ka zayada sy zayada antkhab karnay kay liay۔ ayk bar hum nay day py srny main bhr diya hay ، hum day py [aym] [ayn sy shrwa krkay sab sy tawyl mshtrkha hasawl ki tshkyl nw krsktay hayn۔] aur srny main zayada sy zayada akdar kay rastay par chltay hoey ، tkrar kay rshtay ka astamal karty hawiay: agar S1 [I-1] = S2 [J-1] ، S1 [I-1] ko ntyjha main shaml karain aur akhtrty tawr par day py main mntkl karain [I-1] [J-1] bsawrt dyghr ، zayada sy zayada kymt kay sath mlhakha syl main jaiyn: agar DP [I-1] [j]> DP [I] [J-1] ، DP par jien [I-1] [J] ، bsawrt dyghr day py [i] [J-1] main jien keh taip askrpt main mthark prwghramngh ka astamal karty hoey do tarwn kay darmiyan tawyl trien mshtrkha hasawl tlash karnay kay liye yahan ayk fnkshn ka nfaza haay: taip askrpt fnkshn sab sy tawyl arsaay sy kamnswbsyns (S1: strngh ، strngh): strngh {Const M = S1.length ؛const n = s2.length ؛kanst day py: nmbr [] [] = niy srny (aym + 1)kay liye (i = 1 ؛ i <= m ؛ i ++) {for (j = 1 ؛ j <= n ؛ j ++) {aghr (s1 [i-1] === s2 [j-1]) {dp[i] [j] = dp [i-1] [J-1] + 1 ؛} else {dp [i] [j] = math.max (dp [i-1] [j] ، dp [i] [j-1]) ؛}}} aaiyay i = m ؛j = n ؛kanstngh ntyjha: strngh [] = [] ؛jbkha (i> 0 && j> 0) {aghr (S1 [I-1] === S2 [J-1]) {ntyjha۔ anshft (S1 [I-1]) ؛myn--؛J-- ؛} wrnha agar (dp [i-1] [j]> dp [i] [j-1]) {i-- ؛} else {j-- ؛}} wapsy ka ntyjha۔ join ('') ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk tawyl arsaay sy kamnswbsns fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo do dawrwn ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur dono dawrwn kay mabyn sab sy tawyl arsaay sy aam tawr par pysh aanay wali ayk tar ko lwtata haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay saiza (M+1) X (N+1) kay do jhaty srny DP ki abtda krta hay ، jahan M aur N dono tar ki lmbaiy hain ، aur mthark prwghramngh tkrar kay talkat ka astamal karty hoey saf main bhrty hayn۔as kay bad yeh day py srny main zayada sy zayada akdar ki raha par aml karty hoey sab sy tawyl aam mshtrkha hasawl ki tshkyl nw krta hay ، aur ntyjha ko tar kay tawr par lwtata haay۔ yahan tawyl arsaay sy kamnswbsns fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrptkwnst S1 = 'ABCDGH' ؛ Const S2 = 'aedfhr' ؛CONST LCS = longestcommonsubsence (S1 ، S2) ؛ knswl.lwgh (LCS) ؛// 'as msaal kay tawr par ، hum baltrtyb' ABCDGH 'awr' AEDFHR 'akdar kay sath do niay tar S1 aur S2 tyar karty hayn۔as kay bad hum S1 aur S2 kay sath tawyl trien kamnswbsns fnkshn ko dlail kay tawr par kehty hain aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr LCs ko tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum LCS ki kymt ko knswl par lagh un karain ، jo 'adh'.1leetcode2geeksforgeeks Question: taip askrpt main dajkstra kay mkhtsar trien rastay alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: ghraf main nwdas kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastha tlash karnay kay liye dajkstra ka alghwrthm ayk mkbwl alghwrthm haay۔taip askrpt main dajkstra kay alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay liye bohat sy wsail dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: syrjyghalkwsky/dajkstrra ays-aylghwrythm-nfaza ki ksm ki askrpt-yha ayk ght hab rypwzatry hay js main taip askrpt main dajkstra kay alghwrthm ka nfaza hawta haay۔as par aml draamd aghlay nwda ko dykhnay kay liye mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye trjyhay ktaar ka astamal krta hay ، aur nwdas ki ayk saf ko waps krta hay js main shrwa aur akhttamy nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy hawty haay۔taip askrpt myn۔aml draamd kay liye aghlay nwda ko mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye ayk hayp dayta dahanchay ka astamal krta hay ، aur shrwa aur akhttamy nwdas kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy karnay wali kesi shay ko waps krta haay۔ jawa askrpt main mkhtsar trien raha par aml krna: dajkstra ka alghwrthm - yeh ayk aysa blagh pwst hay js main yeh btaya gaya hay keh kis tarah ki bat haay۔jawa askrpt main dajkstra kay alghwrthm ko nafza karain ، lekin kwda ko aasany sy taip askrpt kay mtaabk dahal liya jaskta haay۔as aml main ghraf main hr nwda sy la kar fasalay par nzar rkhnay kay liye haysh tybl ka astamal kya gaya hay ، aur aghly nwda ko dykhnay kay liye mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye trjyhay ktaar aur trjyhay ktaar۔fnkshn ayk shay lwtta hay jo shrwa aur akhttamy nwdas kay darmiyan mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ jawa askrpt main dayjkstra ka alghwrthm |ryjyna frns kay zaryaha - yeh ayk aur blagh pwst hay js main yeh btaya gaya hay keh jawa askrpt main dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ko kesay nafza kya jaye ، lekin is kwda ko taip askrpt kay mtaabk dahal liya jaskta haay۔aml draamd aghlay nwda ko dykhnay kay liye mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye trjyhay ktaar ka astamal krta hay ، aur astart aur aynda nwdas kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy karnay wali kesi shay ko waps krta haay۔taip askrpt۔as par aml draamd aghlay nwda ko dykhnay kay liye mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye trjyhay ktaar ka astamal krta hay ، aur shrwa aur akhttamy nwdas kay mabyn mkhtsar trien raha ki nmaindghy karnay wali kesi shay ko waps krta haay۔ jawa askrpt main dajkstra kay alghwrthm ko kis tarah nafza karnay ka tarykha |haykrnwn - yeh ayk aur blagh pwst hay js main yeh btaya gaya hay keh jawa askrpt main dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ko kesay nafza kya jaye ، lekin is kwda ko taip askrpt kay mtaabk dahal liya jaskta haay۔as aml main ghraf main hr nwda sy la kar fasalay par nzar rkhnay kay liye haysh tybl ka astamal kya gaya hay ، aur aghly nwda ko dykhnay kay liye mwsar andaza main tlash karnay kay liye trjyhay ktaar aur trjyhay ktaar۔fnkshn ayk aysy shay ko waps krta hay jo shrwa aur akhttamy nwdas kay mabyn mkhtsar trien rastay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ yeh wsail taip askrpt main dayjkstra kay alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay liye mkhtlf nktaha nzar fraham karty hain ، lhazaa aap is main sy ayk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat ko bhatr bnata haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main do trtyb shuda safwn kay mydayn ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main do trtyb shuda safwn kay drmyany drjay ki tlash kay l several kiy nktaha nzar hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: anzumam aur trtyb dyn: ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh dono trtyb shuda safwn ko ayk hi trtyb shuda saf main zum karain ، aur phir anzumam shuda saf ka mydayn tlash kryn۔yha dono safwn ko jwranay ، ntyjay main hony wali safwn ko chhant kar ، aur phir mydayn tlash krkay kya jaskta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt fankshn fainda mydayswrtry (nmbr [nmbr [] ، nmbr [] ، nmbr []): nmbr {cont zum shuda = [... nums1 ، ... nums2] .Sort (a ، b) => a - b - b) ؛const n = zum shdha۔ lmbaiy ؛aghr (n ٪ 2 === 0) {wapsy (zum shuda [n/2 - 1] + zum shuda [n/2])/2 ؛} dusri {wapsy zum shuda [(N-1)/2] ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk fainda mydayswrt darydary fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo do trtyb shuda safwn ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur anzumam shuda saf kay wsta ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay aspryda aaprytr (...) ka astamal karty hoey dono safwn ko hum aahangh krta hay ، js kay ntyjay main srny ko ayk mwazanha fnkshn kay sath trtyb dytay hain jo chrahtay trtyb main trtyb dytay hain ، aur phir is ki lmbaiy ka astamal karty hoey zum shuda saf kay wsta ka hasab lghatay hayn۔srny aur mnasb farmwla۔ bainry tlash: ayk aur nktaha nzar yeh hay keh do trtyb shuda safwn kay wsta ko tlash karnay kay liye bainry srch ka astamal kya jaiay۔yha nktaha nzar anzumam aur trtyb kay nktaha nzar sy zayada mwsar hay ، js main O (lagh (km (mnt (M ، N))) ki ayk wkt ki pychydghy hay ، jahan M aur N dono safwn ki lmbaiy hayn۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt fnkshn fainda mydayswrt daryda (nmbr 1: nmbr [] ، nmbr 2: nmbr []): nmbr {const m = nums1.length ؛const n = nums2.length ؛aghr (m> n) {findMediansortedarrays (nums2 ، nums1) waps karain ؛let lo = 0 ؛aaiyay haaiay = aym ؛jbkha (LO <= HI) {CONST partyshn ayks = (lw + haaiay) >> 1 ؛const partyshn = ((m + n + 1) >> 1) - partyshnks ؛kanst mykslftyks = partyshn ayks === 0؟-infinity: nums1 [partyshnyks - 1] ؛kanst mainraityks = partyshn ayks === aym؟anfynty: nmbr 1 [partyshnyks] ؛kanst mykslyfty = partyshn === 0؟-anfynyty: nmbr 2 [partyshn - 1] ؛kanst mainryty = partyshn === ayn؟anfynty: nmbr 2 [partyshn] ؛if (maxleftx <= minrighty && mykslyfty <= minrightx) {aghr ((m + n) ٪ 2 === 0) {wapsy (math.max (mykslyftyks ، mykslyfty) + math.min (minrightx ، minrighty)) / 2؛} else {waps math.max (mykslyftyks ، mykslyfty) ؛}} dusri sawrt main agar (mykslftyks> mainraity) {haaiay = partyshn ayks - 1 ؛} else {lo = partitionx + 1 ؛}} rytrn -1 ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk fainda mydaymwrt darydary fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo do trtyb shuda safwn ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur zum shuda saf kay wsta ko lwtata haay۔fnkshn pehlay janch pratal krta hay keh aya pehli saf ki lmbaiy dusri saf ki lmbaiy sy zayada hay ، aur agar aysa hay tou ، safwn ko tbdyl karty hain takha yeh ykyny bnaya jaskay keh pehli saf hamyshha chhwty hawty haay۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn dono safwn kay partyshn pwaints ko tlash karnay kay liye bainry tlash ka astamal krta hay ، is tarah keh zum shuda saf kay baien nsaf hasaay main woh tamam anasar shaml hain jo zum shuda saf kay dien nsaf sy kam ya brabr hayn۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn partyshn pwaints aur mnasb farmwlay ka astamal karty hoey anzumam shuda srny kay wsta ka hasab lghata haay۔ yeh sirf chnd msaalyn hain keh taip askrpt main do trtyb shuda safwn ka mydayn kesay tlash kya jaiay۔as kay alawha aur bhi nktaha nzar hain ، jesay dahyrwn ka astamal karna ya alghwrthm ko tksym karna aur ftha krna۔nktaha nzar ka antkhab msilay ki mkhsawsa zurwryat aur sstm ki rkawtwn par mnhasar haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main khud twazan rkhnay waly AVL drkht ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main khud twazan rkhnay waly AVL drkht ko nafza karnay kay liye bohat sary wsail dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: GWTW/TS-AVL-Tree-yha ayk ght hab zakhyrha hay js main taip askrpt main AVL drkht kay dayta dahanchay ka nfaza hawta haay۔as par aml draamd talymy mkasad kay liye tyar kya gaya hay ، lekin isy prwdakshn mahawl main kam karna chahaiay۔ aay wy ayl try ght hab anwanat - yeh ayk ght hab tapk safhaha hay js main taip askrpt main aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn sy mtalk mtadd zakhyrwn ki fharst di hogi haay۔zakhyrwn main aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn kay nfaza kay sath sath dyghr dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthmza۔ jawa askrpt main try try - lrnrs bkt - yeh ayk tywtwryl hay js main yeh btaya gaya hay keh jawa askrpt main aay wy ayl kay drkht ko kis tarah nafza kya jaye ، lekin is kwda ko taip askrpt kay mtaabk bnaya jaskta haay۔tywtwryl aay wy ayl kay drkht ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk mrhalha war ghaiyda fraham krta hay ، js main nwdas bnana ، nwdas ko dakhl karna aur hazaf karna ، aur drkht ko twazan shaml karna shaml haay۔taip askrpt myn۔pykyjwn main aay wy ayl kay drkhtwn kay nfaza kay sath sath dyghr dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthmza.awl ayn py aym shaml hain - yeh ayk ayn py aym pykyj hay jo nwda aur braؤzar kay mahawl kay liye aay wy ayl drkht ka tyza rftar nfaza fraham krta haay۔pykyj main drkhtwn main nwdas daalnay ، hazaf karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykay shaml hayn۔ taip askrpt 25 - aay wy ayl try - ywtywb - yeh ayk ywtywb wydayw hay js main yeh btaya gaya hay keh taip askrpt main aay wy ayl kay drkht ko kesay nafza kya jaiay۔wydayw AVL drkht kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki tfsayly wzuahat fraham krty hay ، js main nwdas ko dakhl karnay aur hazaf karnay ka tarykha ، aur drkht ko kis tarah twazan kaim karna haay۔jw aap ki zurwryat ko bhatryn tawr par ft bythta hay

try ka dwrha krta haay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt klas trynwda {wyl: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (wyl؟: nmbr ، baiyn؟: trynwda | null ، daiyn؟: trynwda | null) {this.val = (wyl === ghair mtaynha؟ 0: wyl) ؛this.left = (baiyn === ghair mtaynha؟ null: baiyn) ؛this.right = (daiyn === ghair mtaynha؟ null: sahayha) ؛}} fnkshn inordertraversal (jra: Treenode | null): nmbr [] {kanstngh ntyjha: nmbr [] = [] ؛Const traverse = (nwda: trynwda | null) => {if (nwda) {traverse (node.left) ؛ntyjha.psh (nwda.wal) ؛traverse (node.right) ؛}} ؛abwr (jra) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main nwda wylyw kay liye wyl praprty ، aur baltrtyb baien aur dien bchwn kay nwdas kay liye baien aur dien khsawsayat kay sath۔as kay bad hum ayk andardar trawrsl fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par jra nwda lyta hay aur aardar main trawrsl trtyb main nwda akdar ki ayk saf ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay nwda ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye khaly saf kay ntaij ki abtda krta hay ، aur phir ayk bar bar aanay waly abwr fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jo baien sab try ، phir jra nwda ، aur phir dien sab try ka dwrha krta haay۔trwrs fnkshn ko jra kay nwda kay sath dlyl kay tawr par kaha jata hay ، aur is kay ntyjay main ntyjha srny waps krdy jati haay۔ yahan andardar trywrsl fnkshn ki ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrptkwnst jra = nya trynwda (1) ؛ rwt۔ rait = nya trynwda (2) rwt rwt.Right.left = nya trynwda (3) ؛ kanstngh ntyjha = inordertraversal (jra) ؛ knswl.lagh (ntyjha) ؛// [1 ، 3 ، 2] is msaal main ، hum 1 ki jra nwda wylyw kay sath ayk nya bainry drkht bnatay hain ، ayk dien bchay ka nwda js ki kymt 2 hay ، aur ayk kymt kay sath dien bchay kay nwda ka baien bchay ka nwda haay۔kay .۔ phir hum rwt nwda kay sath inordertraversal fnkshn ko dlyl kay tawr par kehty hain aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr kay ntaij par Question: taip askrpt main dyiay gaye tar kay tamam ajazat namay tyar karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main dyiay gaye strngh kay tamam ajazat namay pyda karnay kay l we ، hum ayk tkrar nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hain jo hr krdar ko tar main hr dusray krdar kay sath tbdyl krta prmwt haylpr ko kal krta haay۔prmwyt haylpr fnkshn hr krdar ko hr dusray krdar ko tar main hr dusray krdar kay sath tbdyl krta hay ، aur ntyjay main hony waly ajazat namwn ko ntyjha srny main shaml Question: taip askrpt main srkh syaha drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main srkh syaha drkht kay dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye bohat sary wsail dstyab hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn:@jma karnay kay kabl/ryda blyk try-yha ayk NPM pykyj hay jo srkh rngh kay drkht kay dayta dahanchay ka taip askrpt kay mtaabk mtaabkt fraham krta haay۔pykyj main drkht main nwdas ko dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykay shaml hain ، nyza dyghr afadyt kay tarykay۔as par aml draamd main drkht main nwdas ko dakhl karnay ، hazaf karnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykay shaml hain ، nyza dyghr afadyt kay tarykay۔ nylyply/aar by ty ays: taip askrpt ryda blyk try-yha ayk ght hab rypwzatry hay js main srkh syaha drkht kay aadad wa shmar ka nfaza hawta haay۔taip askrpt main sakht۔as par aml draamd main jawa askrpt kay blt un myp taip ki tarah antrfys hay ، lhazaa isy nkshha kay mtbadl kay tawr par astamal kya jaskta hay ، lekin knstrktr main lys aw py pyramytr kay mtaabk trtyb shuda tkrar kay sath۔tlash ka safhaha js main taip askrpt main srkh syaha drkhtwn sy mtalk mtadd pykyjwn ki fharst di hogi haay۔pykyjwn main srkh rngh kay drkhtwn kay nfaza kay sath sath dyghr dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthmza۔alghwrthm tywtr - yeh ayk aysa tywtwryl hay jo srkh rngh kay drkhtwn kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki wzuahat krta hay aur C ++ ، jawa ، aur azaghr main nfaza fraham krta haay۔aghrchha nfaza taip askrpt main nahin hain ، lekin tsawrat aur alghwrthm ko taip askrpt kay mtaabk dahal liya jaskta haay۔ yeh wsail taip askrpt main ryda blyk try dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye mkhtlf nktaha nzar fraham karty hain ، lhazaa aap is main sy ayk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat ko bhatr bnata haay۔

Question: taip askrpt main bainry try par pry aardar try trywrsl anjam denay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main bainry try par pry aardar try trywrsl ko anjam denay kay l we ، hum ayk tkrar nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hain jo jra kay nwda ، phir baien sab try ، aur phir dien sab try ka dwrha krta haay۔as nktaha nzar ko kis tarah nafza karnay kay tarykwn ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: ayk mddghar fnkshn ka astamal: ayk nktaha nzar ayk mddghar fnkshn ki wzuahat karna hay jo mwjwdha nwda aur pry aardar trawrsl ko dlail kay tawr par mhafwza karnay kay liye ayk saf lyta hay ، aur bar bar jra nwda ka dwrha krta hay ، aur bar bar rwt nwda ka dwrha krta hay ،phr baien sab try ، aur phir dien sab try۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt klas trynwda {wyl: nmbr ؛baiyn: trynwda |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda |khaly؛knstrktr (wyl؟: nmbr ، baiyn؟: trynwda | null ، daiyn؟: trynwda | null) {this.val = (wyl === ghair mtaynha؟ 0: wyl) ؛this.left = (baiyn === ghair mtaynha؟ null: baiyn) ؛this.right = (daiyn === ghair mtaynha؟ null: sahayha) ؛}} fnkshn pry aardar trawrsal (jra: trynwda | null): nmbr [] {kanstngh ntyjha: nmbr [] = [] ؛Const traverse = (nwda: trynwda | null ، ntyjha: nmbr []) => {aghr (nwda) {ntyjha. psh (nwda.wal) ؛traverse (node.left ، ntyjha) ؛trawrs (nwda۔ rait ، ntyjha) ؛}} ؛abwr (jra ، ntyjha) ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo bainry drkht main nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main nwda wylyw kay liye wyl praprty ، aur baltrtyb baien aur dien bchwn kay nwdas kay liye baien aur dien khsawsayat kay sath۔as kay bad hum ayk pry aardar trawrsl fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par jra nwda lyta hay aur pry aardar trawrsl trtyb main nwda akdar ki ayk saf ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay nwda ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye khaly srny kay ntaij ki abtda krta hay ، aur phir ayk bar bar chlnay waly trawrs fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jo jra kay nwda ، phir baien sab try ، aur phir dien sab try ka dwrha krta haay۔trawrs fnkshn ko jra kay nwda aur ntyjha srny kay sath dlail kay tawr par blaya jata hay ، aur is kay ntyjay main ntyjha srny waps krdy jati haay۔ yahan pry aardar trawrsl fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrptkwnst jra = nya trynwda (1) ؛ rwt۔ rait = nya trynwda (2 (2) ؛ root.right.left = nya trynwda (3) const kanstr ntyjha = pry aardar trawrsal (jra) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ntyjha) ؛// [1 ، 2 ، 3] is msaal main ، hum 1 ki jra nwda wylyw kay sath ayk nya bainry try tyar karty hain ، ayk dien bchay ka nwda js ki kymt 2 hay ، aur dien bchay kay nwda ka baien bchay ka nwda ayk kymt kay sath haay۔as kay bad hum pry aardar trawrsl fnkshn ko jra nwda kay sath dlyl kay tawr par kehty hain aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr kay ntaij par tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum ntaij ki kdr ko knswl par lagh un karty hain ، jo [1 ، [2] [3] hona chahaiay۔ astyk ka astamal karty hawiay: dusra nktaha nzar yeh hay keh bainry drkht ki tkrary pry aardar trywrsl ko anjam denay kay liye astyk ka astamal kya jaiay۔yhaan ayk msaal aml haay: taip askrpt fkshn pry aardar (nwda.wal) ؛if (node.right) {stack.push (node.right) ؛} if (node.left) {stack.push (node.left) ؛} return wapsy ka ntyjha ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk pry aardar trawrsl fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo rwt nwda ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur pry aardar trawrsl trtyb main nwda akdar ki ayk saf ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay nwda ki akdar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye khaly srny kay trywrsl fnkshn ko dlyl kay tawr par kehty hain aur tfwyzu karty hain

Answer: taip askrpt main napsndydha syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mwjwdha laibryrywn ka astamal krsktay hain ya khud hi nafza krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch wsail hain jo taip askrpt main das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay ko kis tarah nafza karnay ki msaalyn fraham karty hayn: ght hab anwanat-das wynt syt: yeh ayk ght hab tapk pyj hay js main taip askrpt main daswnt syt dayta dahanchay sy mtalk mtadd zakhyrwn ki fharst di hogi haay۔zakhyrwn main mtnazaaha syt dayta dahanchay kay nfaza kay sath sath dyghr dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthmza۔ taip askrpt ko naghwar syt (ywnyn aur tlash alghwrthm) ka nfaza shaml haay۔taip askrpt main sakht۔as par aml draamd main syt bnanay ، syt kay waldyn ko tlash karnay aur sytwn ko zum karnay kay tarykay shaml hayn۔ dayta syt dayta dahanchay - ghyksfwrjyks: yeh ayk aysa tywtwryl hay jo mtnazaaha syt dayta dahanchay ki wzuahat krta hay aur taip askrpt smyt mtadd prwghramngh zabanwn main nfaza fraham krta haay۔tywtwryl main das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay kay zaryaha taawn yaftha karrwaiywn ki wzuahatyn shaml hain ، jesay niay syt shaml karna ، sytwn ko zum karna ، aur kesi syt kay waldyn ko tlash krna۔taip askrpt main dayta dahanchay ko napsnd karnay kay liay۔pykyjwn main das daysyt syt dayta dahanchay kay nfaza kay sath sath dyghr dayta dahanchay aur alghwrthm bhi shaml hayn۔ yeh wsail taip askrpt main ayk dasnt syt dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye mkhtlf nktaha nzar fraham karty hain ، lhazaa aap is main sy ayk ka antkhab krsktay hain jo aap ki zurwryat ko bhatr bnata haay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tykst strngh main pytrn kay wakaat ki tadad ko ghnnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tykst strngh main pytrn kay wakaat ki tadad ko ghnnay kay bohat sary tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: mych () kay tarykha kar ka astamal: ayk nktaha nzar yeh hay keh ayk saf main pytrn kay tamam wakaat ko pyda karnay kay liye strngh msaal kay mych () ka tarykha astamal kya jaye ، aur phir is ki tadad haasal karnay kay liye saf kay saiza ko [i] ؛aghr (! mlahazaha kya [n]) {mlahazaha kya [n] = sch ؛ktaar۔ psh (ayn) ؛}}} kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <this.vertices ؛ i ++) {aghr (! mlahazaha kya [i]) {ghlta waps ؛}} sch waps ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk ghraf klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo ghair hadayt shuda ghraf ki nmaindghy krta haay۔klas main ayk knstrktr hawta hay jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par amwdy ki tadad lyta hay aur ghraf kay liye mlhakha fharst ko shrwa krta haay۔klas kay pas ghraf main knarwn ko shaml karnay ، yeh chyk karnay kay tarykay bhi hain keh aya ghraf chkr hay ya nahin ، aur yeh chyk karna keh ghraf drkht hay ya nhayn۔iscyclicutil () ka tarykha ayk mddghar tarykha hay jo ghharaiy ki pehli tlash krta hay takha yeh malwm kya jaskay keh ghraf main koi saiykl mwjwd hay ya nhayn۔ghraf main hr ghair mnhasar amwdy kay liye iscyclic () tarykha iscyclicutil () ko kal krta hay ، aur agar koi saiykl mil jata hay tou woh sch waps aajata haay۔iStree () ka tarykha pehlay chyk krta hay keh agar ghraf chkr hay ، aur agar yeh hay tou ghalat lwtata haay۔as kay bad yeh tarykha yeh chyk karnay kay liye chwraaiy ki pehli tlash krta hay keh aya ghraf mnslk hay ، aur agar yeh hay tou yeh sch haay۔ ghraf klas ka ayk msaal astamal: taip askrpt kwnst ghraf = nya ghraf (5) ؛ ghraf.dayj (1 ، 0)؛ ghraf.adayj (0 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.adayj (0 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 4) ؛ kanstst aaistry = ghraf.stry () ؛ knswl.lwgh (aaistry) ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، hum 5 amwdy kay sath ayk nya ghraf msaal tyar karty hain ، aur drkht bnanay kay liye ghraf main knarwn ko shaml karty hayn۔as kay bad hum ghraf aabjykt kay iStree () kay tarykha kar ko kal karty hain ، aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr istree ko tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum aaistry ki kdr ko knswl main lagh un karty hain ، jo sch hona chahaiay۔

nmaindghy krta haay۔ ayk haysh fnkshn ki wzuahat karain jo ayk klyd lyta hay aur haysh tybl main ayk andayks lwtata haay۔haysh tybl main klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl karnay kay liye haysh tybl klas ka۔haysh tybl sy wylyw jwray۔ yahan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ki ayk msaal kay nfaza ، 1 sy mwafkt pzayr: taip askrpt klas haysh tybl <ty> {njy akdar: {[klyd: strngh]: ty} ؛njy saiza: nmbr ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.values = {} ؛this.size = saiza ؛} njy hasab ktab haash (klyd: strngh): nmbr {aaiyay haysh = 0 ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <key.length ؛ i ++) {haysh = (haysh << 5) + haysh + klyd۔ chyrkwdayt (i) ؛haysh = haysh & haysh ؛// 32 bt antyjr haysh = ryazuy.bs (haysh) main tbdyl karain ؛} haysh ٪ is ko waps kryn۔ saiza ؛} syt (klyd: strngh ، wylyw: ty) {kanst haysh = this.calculatehash (klyd) ؛this.values [haysh] = kdr ؛} get (key: string): t |ghyr wzuahaty {kanst haysh = this.calculatehash (klyd) ؛as ko waps kryn۔} hataiyn (klyd: strngh) {kanst haysh = this.calculatehash (klyd) ؛as ko hazaf kryn۔}} is msaal main ، hum ayk haysh tybl klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo haysh tybl dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main klydy kdr kay jwraay dakhl karnay ، bazayaft karnay aur hatanay kay tarykay hayn۔syt ka tarykha haysh tybl main ayk klydy kdr ki jwray dakhl krta hay ، haysh tybl main andayks ka hasab lghanay kay liye haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hawiay۔GET tarykha andayks ka hasab lghanay kay liye ayk hi haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey ، haysh tybl sy kesi klyd sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft krta haay۔hatanay ka tarykha haysh tybl sy klydy kdr ki jwray ko hata dyta hay ، isi haysh fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey andayks ka hasab lghata haay۔ haysh tybl klas ka ayk msaal astamal: taip askrpt kwnst HT = nya haysh tybl <strngh> (10) ؛ HT.SET ('fw '،' bar ') ؛ ht.set (' baza '،' qux ') ؛ knswl.lwgh (ht.get (' foo ')) ؛// 'bar'knswl.lwgh (ht.get (' baza ')) ؛// 'qux'ht.remove (' foo ') ؛ knswl.lwgh (ht.get (' foo ')) ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، hum 10 kay saiza kay sath ayk nya haysh tybl msaal tyar karty hain ، aur syt kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey do klydy kymt waly jwraay dakhl karty hayn۔as kay bad hum klydwn kay 'fw' aur 'baza' sy wabstha akdar ko bazayaft karnay kay liye do bar ghyt kay tarykha kar ko kal karty hain ، aur lwtay hoey akdar ko knswl main baltrtyb 'bar' aur 'Qux' hona chahaiay۔as kay bad hum klydy kymt kay jwraay ko klydy 'fw' kay sath hatanay kay liye hataiyn ، aur klydy 'fw' sy wabstha kdr ko bazayaft karnay kay liye dwbarha ghyt tarykha ko kal karain ، js ki wzuahat nahin ki jany chahaiay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ghair trtyb shuda saf main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ghair trtyb shuda saf main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mkhtlf nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: saf ko chhantna: hum srny ko nzawl trtyb main trtyb dy saktay hain aur kay ty aych ansar ko waps krsktay hayn۔yhaan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ka ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 1 sy mwafkt pzayr wzuahat karty hain jo nmbr nmbrwn aur ayk nmbr K ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay ، aur nmbrwn main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko lwtata haay۔fnkshn pehlay trtyb kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey nzawl trtyb main nmbrwn ki saf ko trtyb dyta hay ، aur phir andayks K par ansar ko lwtata hay - 1. dahwndanay waly fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal: taip askrptkwnst nmbr = [3 ، 2 ، 1 ، 5 ، 6 ، 4] ؛ Const K = 2 ؛ const Kthlargest = findkthlargest (nums ، k) ؛ knswl.lwgh (kthlargest) ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، hum akdar [3] [2] [1] [5] [5] [6] [4] ، aur kymt kay sath ayk nmbr K kay sath ayk nya srny nmbr tyar karty hayn۔NUMS aur K ko btawr dlail ، aur ntyjha ayk niay mtghyr Kthlargest ko tfwyzu kryn۔aakhr main ، hum knswl main Kthlargest ki kymt ko lagh un karty hain ، jo 5 mnt kay dahyr ka astamal karty hoey hona chahaiay: hum ghair trtyb shuda saf main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko tlash karnay kay liye ayk mn dahyr ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham saiza K ka ayk kam sy kam dahyr bna saktay hain ، aur sray kay pehlay K anasar ko dahyr main dakhl krsktay hayn۔as kay bad hum srny kay baky anasar par tkrar krsktay hain ، aur agar woh dahyr main kam sy kam ansar sy braay hain tou inhain dahyr main dakhl krsktay hayn۔tmam anasar par tkrar karnay kay bad ، dahyr main kam sy kam ansar saf main KTH ka sab sy braa ansar hawgha۔yhaan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ka ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 2 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt fnkshn faؤnda kaytlrjst (nmbr: nmbr: nmbr [] ، kay: nmbr): nmbr |ghyr wzuahaty {kanst mnhayp = niy srny <nmbr> (kay) ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <k ؛ i ++) {mnyhap [i] = nums [i] ؛} kay liye (aaiyay i = k ؛ i <nums.length ؛ i ++) {aghr (nums [i]> minheap [0]) {minHeap [0] = nums [i] ؛aaiyay j = 0 ؛jbkha (2 * j + 1 <k) {kanst lyftaida andayks = 2 * jay + 1 ؛kwnt raitaida andayks = 2 * jay + 2 ؛aaiyay MININDEX = J ؛aghr (MINHEAP [lifechildIndex] <MINHEAP [MININDEX]) {MININDEX = lyftaida andayks ؛} if (raitchlda andayks <K && MINHEAP [RITELDINDEX] <MINHEAP [MININDEX]) {MININDEX = RITELDINDEX ؛} if (minidex === j) {bryk ؛} [MINHEAP [J] ، MINHEAP [MININDEX]] = [MINHEAP [MININDEX] ، MINHEAP [J]] ؛j = MinIndex ؛}}} MinHEAP waps karain [0] ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk aysy tlash kay baray main wzuahat karty hain jo nmbr nmbrwn ki ayk saf aur ayk nmbr K ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay ، aur nmbrwn main kay ty aych kay sab sy braay ansar ko lwtata haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay saiza K kay ayk niay srny mnhayp ka aaghaza krta hay ، aur dahyr main nmbrwn kay pehlay K anasar dakhl krta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn nmbr kay baky anasar par tkrar krta hay ، aur agar woh dahyr main kam sy kam ansar sy braa hawta hay tou inhain dahyr main dakhl krta haay۔tmam anasar par tkrar karnay kay bad ، dahyr main kam sy kam ansar srny main kay ty aych ty ka sab sy braa ansar hawgha۔ yahan tlash kay liye ayk msaal kay astamal ka astamal: taip askrptkwnst nmbr = [3 ، 2 ، 1 ، 5 ، 6 ، 4] ؛K = 2 ؛ const Kthlargest = findkthlargest (nums ، k) ؛ knswl.lwgh (kthlargest) ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، hum akdar [3] [2] [1] [5] [5] [6] [4] ، aur kymt kay sath ayk nmbr K kay sath ayk nya srny nmbr tyar karty hayn۔NUMS aur K ko btawr dlail ، aur ntyjha ayk niay mtghyr Kthlargest ko tfwyzu kryn۔aakhr main ، hum Kthlargest ki kdr ko knswl main lagh un karty hain ، jo 5.1LeetCode2stackoverflow hona chahaiay

Question: taip askrpt main srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mkhtlf nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk saf ka astamal karty hawiay: hum srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ko nafza karnay kay liye ayk saf ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ayk mkrrha saiza ki ayk saf ko shrwa krsktay hain ، aur bfr kay aaghaza aur akhttam par nzar rkhnay kay liye do pwaintr astamal krsktay hayn۔as kay bad jab hum srny kay akhttam tak phanch jatay hain tou hum akhttamy pwaintr kay ghrd lpytnay kay liye madaywlr ryazuy ka astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ka ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 1 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt klas srklr bfr <ty> {njy bfr: ty [] ؛njy aaghaza: nmbr ؛njy akhttam: nmbr ؛knstrktr (saiza: nmbr) {this.buffer = niy srny <t> (saiza) ؛} njy isempty (): bwlyn {as ko waps kryn۔ astart === this.end ؛} lkhyn (wylyw: ty) {aghr (this.isfull ()) {niy ghltay phynk dyn ('bfr bhra hoa haay') ؛} this.buffer [this.end] = kdr ؛this.end = this.incrementPoint (this.end) ؛} prahyn (): t {if (this.isempty ()) {niy ghltay phynk dyn ('bfr khaly haay') ؛} const value = this.buffer [this.start] ؛this.start = this.incrementPoint (this.start) ؛wapsy ki kymt ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk srklr bfr klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo bfr sy akdar lkhnay aur prahnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، srklr bfr dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔lkhnay ka tarykha bfr main ayk kdr dakhl krta hay ، aur prahnay ka tarykha bfr sy ayk kdr hatata hay aur lwtata haay۔klas ayk mkrrha saiza ka ayk srny bfr astamal krta hay ، aur bfr kay aaghaza aur akhttam ko tryk rkhnay kay liye do pwaintrza shrwa aur akhttam pzayr hawtay hayn۔jb yeh srny kay akhttam par phanch jata hay tou klas kay akhttam pwaintr kay ghrd lpytnay kay liye madaywlr ryazuy ka astamal hawta haay۔ yahan srklr bfr klas ka ayk msaal astamal hawta haay: taip askrpt kwnst bfr = nya srklr bfr <nmbr> (3) ؛ bfr.rait (1) ؛ bfr۔lkhyn (2) ؛ bfr.rait (3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (bfr.ryda ()) ؛// hoey akdar ko knswl main lagh un karty hain ، jo 1 ، 2 ، 3 ، aur 4 hona chahaiay ، is laibryry ka astamal karty hawiay: hum A bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔laibryry taip askrpt main srklr bfr dayta ()) ؛// 2buffer.push (4) ؛ knswl.lagh (bfr.shft ()) ؛// 3console.log (bfr.shft ()) ؛// 4 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum rngh bfr-ty ays laibryry sy rngh bfr klas draamd karty hain ، aur 3 kay saiza kay Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ghraf par chwraaiy ki pehli tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ampwrt {ghraf} sy 'ghraf dayta dahanchha' ؛ kanst ghraf = nya ghraf () ؛ ghraf.adayj ('aay' ، 'by') ؛ ghraf.dayj ('aay' ، 'sy') ؛ ghraf۔ aydajdaj۔).addedge ('e' ، 'f') ؛ fnkshn BFS <T> (ghraf: ghraf <ty> ، astart: ty): ty [] {knstt mlahazaha kryn: t [] = [] ؛kanst ktaar: t [] = [shrwa] ؛jbkha (ktaar۔ lmbaiy> 0) {kwnst nwda = ktaar۔ shft () !؛aghr (! mlahazaha kya ghya۔ktaar.psh (... ghraf.nyghbrs (nwda)) ؛}} wapsy ka dwrha ؛} const bfsresult = bfs (ghraf ، 'a') ؛ knswl.lwgh (bfsresult) ؛// ['a' ، 'B' ، 'C' ، 'D' ، 'E' ، 'F'] taip askrpt kwnst BfSResult = BFS (ghraf ، 'A') ؛ knswl.lwgh (BfSResult) ؛// ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd' ، 'e' ، 'f'] taip askrpt antrfys ghraf nwda <T> {kdr: t ؛prawsy: ghraf nwda <t> [] ؛} fnkshn BFS <T> (shrwa: ghraf nwda <T>): t [] {knstt mlahazaha kryn: t [] = [] ؛kanst ktaar: ghraf nwda <t> [] = [shrwa] ؛jbkha (ktaar۔ lmbaiy> 0) {kwnst nwda = ktaar۔ shft () !؛aghr (! mlahazaha kya ghya۔ anklydas (node.value)) {mlahazaha kya ghya۔ psh (nwda.walyw) ؛ktaar.psh (... nwda.nyghbrza) ؛}} wapsy ka dwrha ؛} taip askrpt knst nwdaya: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {kdr: 'aay' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwdab: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {kdr: 'by' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwdayk: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {wylyw: 'sy' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwdada: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {kdr: 'day' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwday: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {kdr: 'ay' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwdaf: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {wylyw: 'ayf' ، prawsy: []} ؛ nwdaya.nyghbrs = [nwdab ، nwdayk] ؛ nwdab.nyabbrs = [nwda] ؛nodec.neighbors = [nwday ، nwdaf] ؛ noded.neighbors = [nodee] ؛ nodee.neighbors = [nodef] ؛ const bfsresult = bfs (nodea) ؛ knswl.lagh (bfsresult) ؛// ['a' ، 'b' ، 'c' ، 'd' ، 'e' ، 'f']

Question: taip askrpt main trtyb shuda mnslk fharst main bainry srch alghwrthm ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main trtyb shuda lnkda lst main bainry srch alghwrthm ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: lnkda lst klas ki wzuahat karain jo ayk lnkda lst dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ lnkda lst klas kay dakhl karnay ka tarykha kar main lnkda lst main dakhl hony kay liye lnkda lst klas kay dakhl karnay ka tarykhatrtyb shuda aardar۔ lnkda lst klas kay tlash kay tarykha kar ko lnkda fharst main bainry tlash karnay kay liay۔aghla: nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (wylyw: ty) {this.value = value ؛this.next = null ؛class} klas lnkda lst <t> {njy hayda: nwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr () {this.head = null ؛} dakhl karain (wylyw: ty) {kwnst nyw nwda = nya nwda (wylyw) ؛aghr (! this.head || value <this.head.value) {newnode.next = this.head ؛this.head = newnode ؛} dusri {mwjwdha = this.head ؛jbkha (mwjwdha۔ nykst && wylyw> = mwjwdha۔ nykst.wlyw) {mwjwdha = mwjwdha۔ nykst ؛} newnode.next = mwjwdha. nykst ؛mwjwdha۔ nykst = nyw nwda ؛}} tlash (wylyw: ty): nwda <t> |null {let = this.head ؛chlw dien = null ؛jbkha (baiyn! == daiyn) {const mid = this.getMiddle (baiyn ، daiyn) ؛if (mid.value === wylyw) {waps wsta ؛} dusri sawrt main agar (mid.value <wylyw) {baiyn = MID.next ؛} dusri {daiyn = wsta ؛}} waps kaladm ؛} njy getMiddle (baiyn: nwda <t> ، daiyn: nwda <t> | null): nwda <T> {aaiyay sst = baien ؛tyza = baiyn۔ nykst ؛jbkha (tyza! == sahayha) {fast = fast! .next ؛aghr (tyza! == sahayha) {sst = sst۔ nykst !؛fast = fast! .next ؛}} sst wapsy ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk nwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo lnkda fharst main nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main nwda wylyw kay liye wylyw praprty ، aur aghlay nwda kay hawalha kay liye aghly praprty haay۔ham ayk lnkda lst klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo lnkda fharst main nwdas daalnay aur tlash karnay kay tarykwn kay sath ، lnkda lst dayta dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔dakhl karnay ka tarykha trtyb shuda trtyb main lnkda lst main ayk nwda dakhl krta hay ، aur tlash ka tarykha lnkda lst main bainry tlash krta haay۔)) ؛// 5 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk nya lnkda lst msaal tyar karty hain ، aur dakhl karnay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey lnkda lst main panch akdar dakhl karty hayn۔as kay bad hum tlash kay tarykha kar ko wylyw 5 kay sath dlyl kay tawr par kal karty hain ، aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr nwda par tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum nwda ki kymt lagh un karty hayn؟. knswl ki kymt ، jo 5.1geeksforgeeks hona chahaiay

Question: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn keh aya do bainry drkht taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ayk jesay hain ya nhayn۔
Answer: is bat ka tayn karnay kay liye keh aya do bainry drkht taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ayk jesay hain ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat nshandhay krty hay ya nhayn۔dwnwn drkht ayk jesay hayn۔ is bat ki janch pratal karni chahaiay keh aya dono nwdas ki akdar brabr hain ، aur bar bar yeh chyk karain keh aya un kay baien aur dien sab try ayk jesay hayn۔ yahan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ki ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 1 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt klas trynywda <t> {kdr: t ؛baiyn: Treenode <T> |khaly؛daiyn: trynwda <t> |khaly؛knstrktr (wylyw: ty) {this.value = value ؛this.left = null ؛this.right = null ؛}} fnkshn Areidentical <T> (rwt 1: trynwda <t> | null ، rwt 2: trynwda <T> | null): bwlyn {aghr (rwt 1 === null && 2. rait)) ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk trynwda klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo nwda ki nmaindghy krta haay۔bainry try main ، nwda wylyw kay liye ayk kdr ki praprty kay sath ، aur baien aur dien bchay kay nwdas kay hawalay sy baien aur dien khsawsayat kay sath۔ham ayk aysay kam ki wzuahat karty hain jo do trynwda msaalwn ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay ، aur bwlyn ki kymt ko waps krta hay js sy yeh zaahar hawta hay keh aya dono drkht ayk jesay hain ya nhayn۔fnkshn ki janch pratal krty hay keh aya dono nwdas ki akdar brabr hain ، aur bar bar janch pratal krty hay keh agar un kay baien aur dien mlahazaha kya ghya۔} mlahazaha karain (shrwa kryn) ؛wapsy ka dwrha ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk antrfys ghraf nwda ki wzuahat karty hain jo ghraf main ayk nwda ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main nwda wylyw kay liye wylyw praprty ، aur prawsy nwdas ki ayk saf kay liye prawsy mmalk ki praprty hawty haay۔ham ayk DFS fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ksm kay ghraf nwda <t> ka abtdaiy nwda ayk dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay ، aur ghharaiy sy pehlay trtyb main aanay waly nwdas ki ayk saf lwtata haay۔fnkshn ayk khaly saf ka aaghaza krta hay jo dwray waly nwdas ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye jata hay ، aur ghhwnsla wzat fnkshn ki wzuahat krta hay jo nwda kay prawsywn sy bar bar mlta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn abtdaiy nwda kay sath wzat fnkshn ko kal krta hay ، aur mlahazaha ki hogi srny ko waps krta haay۔ day ayf ays fnkshn ki msaal kay tawr par astamal: taip askrpt kwnst nwdaya: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {wyly: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {wylyw: 'by' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwdayk: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {wylyw: 'sy' ، prawsy: []} ؛ kanst nwda: ghraf nwda <strngh> = {kdr.]} ؛ nodea.neighbors = [nwdayb ، nwdayk] ؛ nwdab.nyghbrs = [nwdada] ؛ nwdayk.nyghbrs = [nwday ، nwdaf] ؛ nwdada.nyaibrza = [nwday] ؛ nwday.nyabrs = [nwdaf] ؛ kanst day ayf ays aar ays aar ays ty = [nwdaf] ؛day ayf ays (nwdaya) ؛ knswl.lwgh (day ayf ays aar ayst) ؛// ['a' ، 'b' ، 'd' ، 'e' ، 'f' ، 'c'] is msaal main ، hum ghraf main nwdas ki nmaindghy karnay waly chh ghraf nwda wakaat ki wzuahat karty hain ، aur nwdas kay darmiyan knarwn ko shaml karty hayn۔an kay prawsywn ki jaiydadyn taay krna۔as kay bad hum abtdaiy nwda nwdaya kay sath day ayf ays fnkshn ko dlyl kay tawr par kal karty hain ، aur ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr DFSResult ko tfwyzu karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum DFSRESTULT ki kdr ko knswl main lagh un karty hain ، jo ['a' ، 'b' ، 'd' ، 'e' ، 'F' ، 'C'] hona chahaiay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki saf par anzumam karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey add ki ayk saf par anzumam karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: anzumam ki tkryb ki wzuahat karain jo add ki ayk saf ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur ayk trtyb shuda saf ko waps krta haay۔ anzumam ki tkryb ko bar bar un pt srny ko do aadhay hasaay main tksym karna chahaiay ،anzumam ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey hr aadhay ko trtyb dyn ، aur anzumam ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey do trtyb shuda hasawn ko zum kryn۔ yahan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ki ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 1 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt fnkshn anzumam (ARR: nmbr []): nmbr [] {aghr (arr.lmbaiy <= 1) {wapsy aar aar ؛} kant mdal = ryazuy۔ flwr (arr.length / 2) ؛kanst baien = arr.slice (0 ، wsta) ؛kwnt dien = arr.slice (drmyany) ؛anzumam (anzumam (baiyn) ، anzumam (daiyn))} fnkshn anzumam (baiyn: nmbr [] ، daiyn: nmbr []): nmbr [] {kant ntyjha: nmbr [] = [] ؛aaiyay i = 0 ؛aaiyay j = 0 ؛jbkha (myn <baiyn۔i ++ ؛} else {result.push (daiyn [j]) ؛J ++ ؛} retult rytrn ka ntyjha۔ kwkyt (baiyn.slais (i))۔ kwkyt (daiyn.slais (j)) ؛} is msaal main ، hum anzumam ki tkryb ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par add ki ayk saf ko lyta hay ، aur ayk trtyb shuda saf ko waps krta haay۔fnkshn chyk krta hay keh aya un pt srny ki lmbaiy 1 sy kam ya is kay brabr hay ، aur agar sch hay tou un pt srny ko lwtata haay۔bsawrt dyghr ، fnkshn un pt srny kay drmyany asharyha ka hasab lghata hay ، aur un pt srny ko slais kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey do hasawn main tksym krta haay۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn khud ko un pt srny kay baien aur dien hasawn kay sath bar bar kal krta hay ، aur anzumam ki tkryb ka astamal karty hoey dono trtyb waly hasawn ko zum krta haay۔ anzumam ki tkryb dlail kay tawr par do trtyb shuda safwn ko lyty hay ، aur zum shuda trtyb shuda saf ko waps krty haay۔fnkshn anzumam shuda saf ko astwr karnay kay liye khaly saf ka ntyjha shrwa krta hay ، aur baltrtyb baien aur dien safwn main pwzayshnwn ko tryk karnay kay liye do andayks mtghyr I aur J۔as kay bad fnkshn baien aur dien safwn main mwjwdha pwzayshnwn par akdar ka mwazanha krta hay ، aur chhwty kymt ko ntaij ki saf main dhkyl dyta haay۔fnkshn srny kay andayks mtghyr main azuafha krta hay jahan sy kdr ko dhkyl diya jata tha ، aur is aml ko dharata hay jab tak keh ayk safwn main sy ayk mkml tawr par nah aajaiay۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn baien aur dien safwn kay baky anasar ko ntyjha srny sy jwrata hay ، aur ntyjha srny ko lwtata haay۔ yahan anzumam ki tkryb ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrpt knst aar = [5 ، 2 ، 4 ، 6 ، 1 ، 3] ؛const shardarr = mrjwrt (arr) ؛ knswl.lwgh (shartedar) ؛// [1 ، 2 ، 3 ، 4 ، 5 ، 6]] is msaal main ، hum antyjrza aar aay aar ki ayk saf ki wzuahat karty hain ، aur astdlal kay tawr par aay aar aar kay sath anzumam ki tkryb ko kal karty hayn۔ham ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr trtyb waly ko tfwyzu karty hain ، aur chhantyar ki kymt ko knswl main lagh un karain ، jo [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] [6] .1 ghythb hona chahaiay۔

Question: ayk prwghram lkhyn takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh aya bainry try taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey mtwazan hay ya nhayn۔
taip askrpt main do ktaarwn ka astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza kryn۔
Answer: taip askrpt main do ktaarwn ka astamal karty hoey astyk ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: astyk klas ki wzuahat karain jo astyk anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye do ktaar msaalwn ka astamal krta haay۔ astyk klas main ayk psh tarykha hona chahaiay js main astyk kay awpry hasaay main ansar shaml hawta haay۔، ayk pap tarykha jo astyk kay awpry ansar ko hatata hay aur lwtata hay ، aur ayk jhanknay wala tarykha jo astyk kay awpry ansar ko isy hataiay baghair lwtata haay۔ psh kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum niay ansar ko ktaar main sy ayk main shaml krsktay hain ، awrphr tamam anasar ko dusri ktaar sy pehli ktaar main mntkl kryn۔ pap kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum ktaar main sy kesi ayk kay awpry ansar ko hata kar waps krsktay hayn۔ jhanknay kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay liye ، hum main sy kesi ayk ka awpry ansar waps krsktay hayn۔as ko hataiay baghair ktaaryn۔ yahan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ki ayk msaal kay nfaza ، 1 sy mwafkt pzayr: taip askrpt klas ktaar <t> {njy astwryj: t [] = [] ؛enqueue (aaitm: t): batal {this.storage.push (aaitm) ؛} dequeue (): t |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔ astwryj.shft () ؛} saiza (): nmbr {as ko waps kryn۔ astwryj۔ lmbaiy ؛class} klas astyk <t> {njy ktaar 1: ktaar <t> = niy ktaar <t> () ؛njy ktaar 2: ktaar <t> = niy ktaar <t> () ؛psh (aaitm: ty): batal {this.queue1.enqueue (aaitm) ؛jbkha (this.queue2.size ()> 0) {this.queue1.enqueue (this.queue2.dequeue ()!) ؛} [this.queue1 ، this.queue2] = [this.queue2 ، this.queue1] ؛} pap (): ty |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔} jhanknay (): t |ghyr wzuahaty {as ko waps kryn۔ kywi 2۔saiza ()> 0؟this.queue2.storage [0]: ghair mtaynha ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk ktaar klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo ktaar sy anasar ko shaml karnay aur hatanay kay tarykwn kay sath ktaar kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta haay۔ham ayk astyk klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo astyk kay aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main astyk main mwjwd anasar ko shaml karnay ، hatanay aur jhanknay kay tarykwn kay sath۔astyk klas astyk anasar ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye do ktaar msaalwn ka astamal krty haay۔ astyk klas ka psh tarykha astyk kay awpry hasaay main ayk nya ansar shaml krta hay js sy isy ktaar 1 main lghaya jata hay ، aur phir tamam anasar ko ktaar 2 sy ktaar 1 main mntkl kya jata haay۔as kay bad yeh tarykha ktaar 1 aur ktaar 2 kay hawalwn ko tbdyl krta haay۔ astyk klas ka pap tarykha ktaar 2 sy kesi ansar ko khtm krkay astyk kay awpry ansar ko hatata hay aur waps krta haay۔ astyk klas ka jhanknay wala tarykha astyk kay awpry ansar ko hataiay baghair waps krta haay۔yha ktaar 2 kay pehlay ansar ko waps krkay۔ yahan astyk klas ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrptkwnst astyk = nya astyk <nmbr> () ؛ astyk.psh (1) ؛ astyk.psh (2) ؛ astyk.psh (3) ؛knswl.lagh (astyk.pyk ()) ؛// 3console.log (stack.pop ()) ؛// 3console.log (stack.pop ()) ؛// 2console.log (stack.pop ()) ؛// 1console.log (stack.pop ()) ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk nya astyk msaal tyar karty hain ، aur psh kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk main tyn anasar shaml karty hayn۔as kay bad hum jhanknay kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey astyk kay awpry ansar par jhank kar knswl par kymt lghatay hain ، jo 3 hona chahaiay۔baltrtyb 2 ، aur 1۔aakhr main ، hum kwshsh karty Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mkhtlf nktaha nzar astamal krsktay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: ayk lalchy alghwrthm ka astamal: hum addywn ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha tlash karnay kay liye lalchy alghwrthm ka astamal krsktay hayn۔ham ayk aysay fnkshn ki wzuahat krsktay hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par add ki ayk saf lyta hay ، aur saf main hr nmbr par tkrar krta haay۔har ayk tadad kay l we ، hum mwjwdha rkm ko jo bhi braa ho is kay liye trtyb dy saktay hayn: mwjwdha nmbr kay alawha mwjwdha rkm ، ya mwjwdha nmbr۔ham zayada sy zayada rkm bhi taay krsktay hain jo bhi braa haw: mwjwdha rkm ya mwjwdha zayada sy zayada rkm۔yhaan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ka ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 1 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt fnkshn myksbryry (nmbr: nmbr []): nmbr {kryntm = nmbr [0] ؛aaiyay maxsum = nums [0] ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 1 ؛ i <nums.length ؛ i ++) {kryntsm = math.max (nums [i] ، kryntsm+nmbr [i]) ؛myksm = ryazuy۔ myks (myksm ، kryntsm) ؛max myksm wapsy ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk myksbrry fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par add ki ayk saf lyta hay ، aur zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha waps krta haay۔fnkshn un pt srny kay pehlay ansar main kryntm aur myksm mtghyrat ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn un pt srny kay baky anasar par tkrar krta hay ، aur krynsm mtghyr ko jo bhi braa hawta hay isy taay krta haay: mwjwdha ansar kay alawha kryntm mtghyr ، ya mwjwdha ansar۔fnkshn myksm mtghyr ko bhi jo bhi braa ho is kay liye mkrr krta haay: kryntm mtghyr ya myksm mtghyr۔as kay bad fnkshn myksm mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ yahan myksbrry fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrpt kwnst nmbr = [-2 ، 1 ، -3 ، 4 ، -1 ، 2 ، 1 ، -5 ، 4] ؛ kanstngh ntyjha = myksbray (nmbrza) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ntyjha) ؛// 6 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hum antyjr nmbrwn ki ayk saf tyar karty hain ، aur dlyl kay tawr par NUMS kay sath myksbrry fnkshn ko kal karty hayn۔ham ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr kay ntaij par tfwyzu karty hain ، aur ntaij ki kymt ko knswl par lagh un karain ، jo 6. kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka astamal karty hoey hona chahaiay: hum addywn ki ayk saf main zayada sy zayada sbryir ki rkm tlash karnay kay liye kdaanay kay alghwrthm ka bhi astamal krsktay hayn۔kdaanay ka alghwrthm lalchy alghwrthm sy mlta jlta hay ، lekin is main krynsm mtghyr ko ap dayt karnay kay liye kdray mkhtlf nktaha nzar ka astamal kya jata haay۔yhaan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ka ayk msaal aml hay ، js main 2 sy mwafkt pzayr haay: taip askrpt fnkshn myksbry (nmbr: nmbr []): nmbr {aaiyay mykswfr = nmbr [0] ؛aaiyay maxiendHere = nums [0] ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 1 ؛ i <nums.length ؛ i ++) {maxundeHere = math.max (nums [i] ، myksynday hayr+nmbr [i]) ؛mykswfr = myth.myks (mykswfr ، myksyndayir) ؛max myksfar ko waps karain ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk myksbry fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par addywn ki ayk saf lyta hay ، aur zayada sy zayada sbry ka mjmwaha waps krta haay۔fnkshn un pt srny kay pehlay ansar kay liye myks safr aur myksynday haaiyr mtghyrat ki abtda krta haay۔as kay bad yeh fnkshn un pt srny kay baky anasar par tkrar krta hay ، aur myksynday haaiyr mtghyr ko jo bhi braa hawta hay isy taay krta haay: mwjwdha ansar ya mwjwdha ansar kay alawha myksyndayir mtghyr۔fnkshn mykssfr mtghyr ko bhi jo bhi braa ho is kay liye bhi taay krta haay: myks safr mtghyr ya myksynday haair mtghyr۔as kay bad fnkshn myks safr mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔ yahan myksbrry fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal haay: taip askrptkwnst nmbr = [-2 ، 1 ، -3 ، 4 ، -1 ، 2 ، 1 ، -5 ، 4] ؛ kanstngh ntyjha = myksbray (nmbrza) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ntyjha) ؛// 6 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hum antyjr nmbrwn ki ayk saf tyar karty hain ، aur dlyl kay tawr par NUMS kay sath myksbrry fnkshn ko kal karty hayn۔ham ntyjha ko ayk niay mtghyr kay ntaij par tfwyzu karty hain ، aur knswl par ntyjha ki kymt ko lagh un karain ، jo 6.1 kwdaybn 2 jy ay ay Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey dyiay gaye tar main sab sy tawyl pylndarwmk astrngh tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt fynkshn sab sy tawyl pylndarwwm (ays: strngh): strngh {kanst ayn = ays lmbaiy ؛kanst day py: bwlyn [] [] = srny۔sb sy tawyl = '' ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <n ؛ i ++) {dp [i] [i] = sch ؛sb sy tawyl = s [i] ؛} kay liye (aaiyay i = n-1 ؛ i> = 0 ؛ i--) {for (j = i+1 ؛ j <n ؛ j ++) {aghr (s [i] === s [j]){if (j - i === 1 || dp [i + 1] [j - 1]) {dp [i] [j] = sch ؛aghr (j - i + 1> tawyl tryn۔ lmbaiy) {tawyl trien = s.substring (i ، j + 1) ؛}}}}} tawyl trien lwtna ؛} taip askrptkwnst s = 'babad' ؛ kanstngh ntyjha = tawyl trien plaindarwwm (ays) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ntyjha) ؛// 'babtaipyskrpt fnkshn sab sy tawyl trien plaindarwwm (ays: strngh): strngh {tawyl trien =' '؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <s.length ؛ i ++) {chhwra dyn = i ؛chlw dien = i ؛jbkha (baiyn> = 0 && dien <s.length && s [baiyn] === s [daiyn]) {baiyn-- ؛hak ++ ؛} kwnt pylndarwwm = ays sybstrngh (baiyn + 1 ، daiyn) ؛if (palindrome.length> tawyl tryn۔ lmbaiy) {tawyl trien = palindrome ؛} baien = i ؛daiyn = i + 1 ؛jbkha (baiyn> = 0 && dien <s.length && s [baiyn] === s [daiyn]) {baiyn-- ؛hak ++ ؛} const Evenpalindrome = s.substring (baiyn + 1 ، daiyn) ؛if (evepalindrome.length> tawyl tryn۔ lmbaiy) {tawyl trien = Evenpalindrome ؛}} sab sy tawyl wapsy ؛} taip askrptkwnst s = 'babad' ؛ kanstngh ka ntyjha = tawyl trien palndrwwm (ays) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ntyjha) ؛// 'bab'

Question: mlhakha mytrks ko nafza karain aur taip askrpt main ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye is ka astamal kryn۔
Answer: kesi mlhakha mytrks ko nafza karnay aur taip askrpt main ghraf ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye is ka astamal karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ka astamal krsktay hayn: ghraf kay mlhakha mytrks ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye ayk ghraf klas ki wzuahat kryn۔ ghraf klas main amwdy ko shaml karnay kay tarykay hona chahaiay۔awr ghraf kay knaray ، aur ayk wrtyks kay prawsywn ko haasal karnay kay l .۔ aydawrtyks kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mlhakha mytrks main ayk niy ktaar aur kalm shaml krsktay hain ، aur un ko 0. aydajda kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay liye shrwa krsktay hain ، hum syt krsktay hayn۔mlhakha mytrks main isi ansar sy mtalk ansar 1. ghyt nybs kay tarykha kar ko nafza karnay kay l we ، hum mlhakha mytrks main mtalkha wrtyks ki ktaar par tkrar krsktay hain ، aur kalmwn kay asharay waps krsktay hain js ki kymt 1. is ki ayk msaal haay۔taip askrpt main nktaha nzar ، 1 sy mwafkt pzayr: taip askrpt klas ghraf {njy mlhakha mytrks: nmbr [] [] ؛knstrktr (njy nmbr: nmbr) {this.adjacencymatrix = array.from ({lmbaiy: Numvertices} ، () => srny.frm ({lmbaiy: nmbr} ، () => 0)) ؛} aydawrtyks (): batal {this.numvertices ++ ؛this.adjacencymatrix.foreach ((ktaar) => ktaar.psh (0)) ؛this.adjacencymatrix.push (array.from ({lmbaiy: this.numvertices} ، () => 0)) ؛} aydaj (say: nmbr ، say: nmbr): batal {this.adjacencymatrix [say] [say] = 1 ؛this.adjacencymatrix [to] [say] = 1 ؛} getneighbors (vertex: nmbr): nmbr [] {knst prawsy: nmbr [] = [] ؛kay liye (i = 0 ؛ i <this.numvertices ؛ i ++) {aghr (this.adjacencymatrix [vertex] [i] === 1) {prawsy.psh (i) ؛}} prawsywn ki wapsy ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk ghraf klas ki wzuahat karty hain jo ghraf main aadad wa shmar kay dahanchay ki nmaindghy krta hay ، js main ghraf main amwdy aur knarwn ko shaml karnay kay tarykay ، aur ayk wrtyks kay prawsywn ko haasal karnay kay tarykwn kay sath۔klas ghraf kay mlhakha mytrks ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye do jhaty saf ka astamal krty haay۔aydawrtyks ka tarykha mlhakha mytrks main ayk niy ktaar aur kalm ka azuafha krta hay ، aur un ko 0 par shrwa krta haay۔ aydajj ka tarykha mlhakha mytrks main isi ansar ko 1. par taay krta haay۔awr kalmwn kay asharay waps krta hay js ki kymt 1. ghraf klas ka ayk msaal haay: taip askrptkwnst ghraf = nya ghraf (4) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 1) ؛ ghraf.dayj (0 ، 2) ؛ghraf.adayj (1 ، 2) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 0) ؛ ghraf.dayj (2 ، 3) ؛ ghraf.dayj (3 ، 3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (ghraf.jyt nybbrs (2)) ؛// [0 ، 1 ، 3] is msaal main ، hum 4 amwdy kay sath ayk nya ghraf msaal tyar karty hain ، aur aydaj kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey ghraf main 6 knarwn ko shaml karty hayn۔as kay bad hum ghyt nybbrs kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey wrtyks 2 kay prawsywn ko haasal karty hain ، aur knswl ki kymt ko Answer: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey tarwn ki ayk saf kay darmiyan sab sy tawyl mshtrkha sabkha tlash karnay kay l we ، hum mndrjha zayl nktaha nzar ko astamal krsktay hayn: ayk mtghyr kay sabkha ko khaly tar main shrwa kryn۔ sray main pehlay tar kay krdarwn ka jaizaha lyn۔ hr krdar kay liye ، baky par tkrar kryn۔saf main dawrwn main sy ، hr tar main ayk hi pwzayshn par krdar ka mwazanha karty hawiay۔ agar tamam harwf sy mltay hain tou ، krdar ko sabkha mtghyr main shaml kryn۔aghr nahin tou ، pryfks mtghyr ko waps kryn۔ agar tkrar waps kyay baghair mkml hawjaiay tou ، pryfks mtghyr ko waps kryn۔ yahan kuch aysay wsail hain jo is msilay ko hal karnay ki msaalyn fraham karty hayn: kwday bwny wyb sait lyt kwda ko taip askrpt ka hal fraham krty hay ""swal۔hal mzakwrha bala nktaha nzar ka astamal krta hay ، jo saf main pehlay tar kay krdarwn par tkrar krta hay aur baky dawrwn main krdarwn sy un ka mwazanha krta haay۔ lyt kwda wyb sait "sb sy tawyl aam makbl" msilay ka aasan taip askrpt hal fraham krty haay۔as hal main mzakwrha bala nktaha nzar ka astamal kya gaya hay ، jo saf main pehlay tar kay krdarwn par tkrar karty hain aur baky dawrwn main un kay krdarwn sy un ka mwazanha karty hayn۔ dankn myk aardal wyb sait lyt kwda "sb sy tawyl mshtrkha sabkha" msilha ka jawa askrpt hal fraham krty haay۔hal mzakwrha bala nktaha nzar ka astamal krta hay ، jo saf main pehlay tar kay krdarwn par tkrar krta hay aur un kay baky dawrwn main krdarwn sy mwazanha krta haay۔ yahan taip askrpt main is nktaha nzar ki ayk msaal kay tawr par aml draamd: taip askrpt fnkshn tawyl trien kamwmn pryfks (ays ty aar ays: strngh []): strngh {aghr (str.length === 0) {wapsy "" ؛} lyt pryfks = "" ؛kay liye (aaiyay i = 0 ؛ i <strs [0] .length ؛ i ++) {const char = strs [0] [i] ؛kay liye (j = 1 ؛ j <strs.length ؛ j ++) {aghr (i> = strs [j] .length || strs [j] [i]! == char) {wapsy ka sabkha ؛}} pryfks += char ؛} wapsy ka sabkha ؛} is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk tawyl arsaay sy kam karnay waly fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk dlyl kay tawr par tarwn ki ayk saf lyta hay aur tar kay darmiyan sab sy tawyl aam sabkha waps krta haay۔fnkshn sab sy pehlay chyk krta hay keh aya srny khaly hay ، aur agar yeh hay tou khaly tar waps krta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn ayk khaly tar kay liye ayk sabkha mtghyr ki abtda krta hay ، aur saf main pehlay tar kay krdarwn par tkrar krta haay۔har krdar kay l the ، fnkshn saf main baky dawrwn par tkrar krta hay ، hr tar main ayk hi pwzayshn par krdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr tamam harwf mmasal hain tou ، fnkshn krdar ko sabkha mtghyr main shaml krta haay۔aghr nahin tou ، fnkshn sabkha mtghyr ko lwtata haay۔aghr tkrar waps kyay baghair mkml hawjaty hay tou ، fnkshn sabkha mtghyr ko waps krta haay۔ yahan tawyl arsaay sy kam karnay wali pryfks fnkshn ka ayk msaal astamal hawta haay: taip askrptkwnst ays ty aar ays = ["phwl" ، "flw" ، "flait"] ؛ kwnt pryfks = tawyl arsaay sy kamn pry fks (ays ty aar) ؛ knswl۔lagh (sabkha) ؛// "FL" is msaal kay tawr par ، hum tar ki ayk saf tyar karty hain aur tawyl arsaay sy kam ka astamal karty hoey tarwn main sab sy tawyl aam sabkha tlash karty hain ، js ka ntyjha knswl main lagh un hawta haay۔

Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey ghraf par byl myn fwrda mkhtsar trien rastha alghwrthm anjam denay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
