Question: jawa askrpt
Answer: jawa askrpt ayk prwghramngh zaban hay jo wyb dawylpmnt 12 main wsya pymanay par astamal hawty haay۔yha ayk halka phlka ، tshryha shuda ، ya sirf wkty tawr par mrtb shuda zaban hay jo ECMAScript Standard32 kay mtaabk haay۔jawa askrpt ka astamal aksar mthark tawr par ap dayt karnay waly mwad ko bnanay ، mlty mydaya ko kntrwl karnay ، tsaawyr ko mthark karnay aur wyb pyjza 4 par pychydha khsawsayat ko nafza karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔jawa askrpt ko sykhnay kay liye kuch wsail yeh hayn: jawa askrpt daat kam: yeh wyb sait jawa askrpt kay abtdaiy afrad kay liye wsail aur msaalwn kay sath sath jawa askrpt kay maharyn ki hamayt fraham krty haay۔yha aap ko jawa askrpt 5.W3Schools sykhnay main mdd kay l on aan daymanda aywnts ، kwrsza aur rastay bhi pysh krta haay: yeh wyb sait jawa askrpt ka ayk jama tywtwryl pysh krty hay js main jawa askrpt kay hr wrzen ko bnyady sy la kar aydawansda tak ka ahaataha kya gaya haay۔as main hr bab ki msaalyn aur "khwd kwshsh kryn" aydaytr bhi shaml hain jahan aap makhza kwda main trmym krsktay hain aur ntyjha 1. aym day ayn wyb dstawyzaat dykh saktay hayn: yeh wyb sait jawa askrpt ki tfsayly wzuahat fraham krty hay ، js main is ki bnyady khsawsayat ، bldangh blaks aur ashyaa shaml hayn۔as main kuch bnyady swalat kay jwabat bhi dyiay gaye hain jesay "jawa askrpt kya haay؟" ، "yha kis tarah lghta haay؟" ، aur "yha kya krskta haay؟" 3. jdyd jawa askrpt tywtwryl: yeh wyb sait jawa askrpt ki ayk sadha ، lekin tfsayly wzuahat pysh krty haay۔، shrwa sy shrwa hawkr aur aw aw py jesay aaly drjay kay tsawrat ki taraf jana۔

Question: jawa askrpt main lharanay kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh kis tarah mtghyr aur fnkshn aalanat ko mtasar krta haay۔
Answer: lhara dena jawa askrpt main ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo mtghyrat aur fnkshn kay aalamyay ko kwda ko 123456 par aml draamd karnay sy pehlay apnay mtalkha askwps kay awpry hasaay main mntkl karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aap kesi mtghyr ya fnkshn ko aalan karnay sy pehlay astamal krsktay hain ، lekin sirf is sawrt main jab isy VAR mtalwbha alfaza kay sath aalan kya jaiay۔aghr aap lyt ya kanst kay sath kesi mtghyr ka aalan karty hain tou ، aap is ki kymt ko kesi kymt kay sath shrwa karnay sy pehlay is tak rsaiy haasal nahin krsktay hayn۔ yahan keh kis tarah haaistngh mtghyr aur fnkshn kay aalamyay ko mtasar krty haay: mtghyr aalamyha: jab mtghyr ko VAR mtalwbha alfaza kay sath aalan kya jata hay tou ، isy upar sy lharaya jata haay۔as kay dairha kar ki aur ghair mtaynha kymt ki kymt kay sath shrwa kya ghya۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aap mtghyr ko aalan karnay sy pehlay hi astamal krsktay hain ، lekin is ki kymt is wkt tak wzuahat ki jaye gi jab tak keh is ko bad main kwda 13456 main ayk kymt tfwyzu nah ki jaiay۔aghr aap lyt ya kanst kay sath kesi mtghyr ka aalan karty hain tou ، isy apnay dairha kar kay awpry hasaay main bhi lharaya jata hay ، lekin is ki abtda kesi kdr kay sath nahin ki jati haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aap mtghyr ko wylyw 1 kay sath shrwa karnay sy pehlay astamal nahin krsktay hayn۔ fnkshn aalanat: jab kesi fnkshn ko fnkshn ki wrda kay sath aalan kya jata hay tou ، isy is kay dairha kar kay awpry hasaay main lharaya jata hay aur is sy pehlay keh is ka aalan 123456 haw۔as ki wjha yeh hay keh is ka nam aur jsm smyt sara fnkshn lharaya jata haay۔taham ، agar aap kesi fnkshn kay azahaar ka astamal karty hoey kesi fnkshn ka aalan karty hain (jysay Myfunc = fnkshn () {}) ، tou sirf mtghyr aalamyha lharaya jata hay ، fnkshn baday nhayn۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aap is fnkshn ko aalan karnay sy pehlay astamal nahin krsktay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، lharanay sy aap mtghyrat aur afaal ko aalan karnay sy pehlay astamal karnay ki ajazat dytay hain ، lekin sirf is sawrt main jab woh VAR mtalwbha alfaza kay sath aalan kya jata hay ya btawr fnkshn aalanat۔aghr aap lyt ya kanst kay sath kesi mtghyr ka aalan karty hain ، ya kesi fnkshn ka astamal karty hoey kesi fnkshn kay sath ، aap un ko shrwa karnay sy pehlay baltrtyb ya aalan karnay sy pehlay astamal nahin krsktay hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main dayta ki mkhtlf aksam kya hayn؟msaalwn kay sath hr ksm ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main dayta ki mkhtlf aksam hain jn ko tyn aham aksam main tksym kya jaskta haay: kdym ، jama aur khsawsay dayta taip 12۔jawa askrpt main dayta ki mkhtlf aksam yeh hayn: kdym aadad wa shmar ki aksam: yeh jawa askrpt main dayta ki bnyady aksam hayn۔an main shaml hayn: strngh: mtny aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jesay nam ، ptay aur pyghamat۔tar snghl ya dabl kymtwn ya byk tks main band hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: "haylw" ، 'wrlda' ، ya `haylw ، $ {nam}!`. nmbr: addy aadad wa shmar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، js main addy ، aasharyha aur sainsy asharay shaml hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: 42 ، 3.14 ، ya 1.23E-4.wolean: mntaky akdar ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، ya tou sahayha ya ghlta۔msaal kay tawr pr: aaiyay x ؛ .null: kesi bhi chyza ki kymt ki jan bwjh kar adm mwjwdghy ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: chlw y = null ؛. symbol: ayk anwkha shnakht knndha ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔alamtyn aksar ashyaa main chabyan kay tawr par astamal hawty hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst sm = alamt ('tfsayl') ؛. bghynt: sawabdydy sahat sy mtalk add ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ayk add lfzay kay akhttam tak N ko shaml krkay braay pymanay par tfryk ki jati haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: Const BigInt = 9007199254740991n ؛. kampwzaait dayta ki aksam: yeh pychydha aadad wa shmar ki aksam hain jo mtadd akdar ka anakad krskty hayn۔an main shaml hayn: aabjykt: mtalkha aadad wa shmar kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ashyaa ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany main band hain aur klydy kdr kay jwraay par mushtamil hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst prsn = {nam: 'jan' ، amr: 30} ؛. srny: akdar kay zakhyray ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jo kesi bhi dayta ki ksm ka hawskta haay۔safyn mrba brykt main band hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst nmbr = [1] [2] [3] [4] [5] ؛. fnkshn: kwda kay dwbarha astamal kay kabl blak ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo ayk khasa kam anjam dyta haay۔afaal pyramytrza aur wapsy ki akdar la saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: fnkshn shaml karain (a ، b) a + b waps karain ؛}. khsawsay aadad wa shmar ki aksam: yeh jawa askrpt main aadad wa shmar ki anwkhy aksam hayn۔an main shaml hayn: nan: kesi aysy kdr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo nmbr nahin haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanstngh ntyjha = 10 / 'haylw' ؛. anfynty: kesi aysy kdr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay jo kesi bhi dusray nmbr sy zayada haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst zayada sy zayada = nmbr۔ myks_ wylyw * 2 ؛. khlasaha main ، jawa askrpt main aath kdym aadad wa shmar ki aksam ، tyn jama dayta ki aksam ، aur do khsawsay dayta ki aksam hayn۔an aadad wa shmar ki aksam ko smjhna mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye zurwry haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main ashyaa ko kis tarah tkhlyk aur astamal karty hayn؟aabjykt tkhlyk aur praprty tak rsaiy ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main ashyaa bnanay aur astamal karnay kay mkhtlf tarykay hayn۔yhaan kuch msaalyn hayn: aabjykt kay lfzay nhaw ka astamal karty hoey ashyaa ki tshkyl: jawa askrpt main kesi shay ko bnanay ka yeh aasan trien tarykha haay۔aap ghhwbghhraly mnhany khtawta whadany {} ka astamal karty hoey ayk byan main kesi shay ki wzuahat aur tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst prsn = {nam: 'jan' ، amr: 30 ، mshghlha: ['prahna' ، 'khyl' ، 'kwdangh'] ، slam: fnkshn () {knswl.lagh ('sb ko haylw۔') ؛} ، askwr: {ryazuy: 90 ، sains: 80}} niay mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal karty hoey aabjykt bnana: aabjykt tkhlyk ka yeh tarykha jywwa ki tarah klas par mbny zabanwn main ashyaa ko tkhlyk karnay kay tarykay sy mlta jlta haay۔niay mtalwbha alfaza ka astamal karty hoey kesi shay ko bnanay kay l you ، aap ko knstrktr fnkshn ki zurwrt haay۔msaal kay tawr pr: fnkshn shkhsa (nam ، amr) {this.name = nam ؛this.age = amr ؛this.greet = fnkshn () {knswl.lwgh ('haylw sb۔') ؛} ؛} const prnt 1 = nya shkhsa ('jan' ، 30) const const conster2 = nya shkhsa ('jyn' ، 25) ؛ aabjykt ka astamal karty hoey ashyaa bnana۔prwtw taip aabjykt۔msaal kay tawr pr: kanst prsn = {nam: 'jan' ، amr: 30 ، slam: fnkshn () {knswl.lagh ('haylw sb۔') ؛}} ؛ const person1 = aatrazu۔msaal kay tawr pr: knswl.lwgh (shkhsay nam) ؛// aaؤt pt: johnconsole.log (shkhsa ['amr']) ؛// aaؤt pt: 30in ka khlasaha ، aap jawa askrpt main aabjykt lghwy nhaw ، nya mtalwbha alfaza ، ya aabjykt ka astamal karty hoey ashyaa tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔ kryt ()۔aap daat asharay ya brykt asharay ka astamal karty hoey kesi shay ki khsawsayat tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main NULL aur ghair mtaynha kay darmiyan frk ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main kaladm aur ghair mtaynha do mkhtlf tsawrat hayn۔nwl aur ghair mtaynha kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: taryf: NULL kesi bhi chyza ki kymt ki jan bwjh kar adm mwjwdghy hay ، jabky ghair mtaynha mtalb yeh hay keh ayk mtghyr ka aalan kya gaya hay lekin isy ayk kdr ki kymt nahin di hogi haay۔taip aabjykt ki ، jabky ghair mtaynha tawr par jawa askrpt 123 main ayk ksm haay۔ kymt: jab kesi mtghyr ko kaladm krar diya jata hay tou ، is ki koi kdr nahin hawty hay ، jabky jab koi mtghyr ghair mtaynha nahin hawta hay tou ، is ka mtalb yeh hawta hay keh kymt mrtb karnay waly 123 main mwjwd nahin haay۔ksy khaly ya ghair mwjwd kymt ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ghair mtaynha tawr par kesi mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js ka aalan kya gaya hay lekin is ko tfwyzu nahin kya gaya haay۔jb skht msawat aaprytr (===) astamal karty ho tou ، kaladm aur ghair mtaynha tawr par brabr nahin hawtay hayn۔taham ، jab dahylay msawat aaprytr (==) ka astamal karty hain tou ، NULL aur ghair wzuahaty tawr par 123 kay brabr hayn۔ khlasaha ، NULL aur ghair mtaynha jawa askrpt main mkhtlf tsawrat hayn۔NULL ko khaly ya ghair mwjwd kdr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay ، jabky ghair mtaynha tawr par kesi mtghyr ki nmaindghy karnay kay liye astamal kya jata hay js ka aalan kya gaya hay lekin is ki kymt tfwyzu nahin ki hogi haay۔NULL ksm ki chyza hay ، jabky ghair mtaynha tawr par jawa askrpt main ayk ksm haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main bndsh kya haay؟as ki ayk msaal fraham karain keh kis tarah bndsh ko astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk bndsh jawa askrpt main ayk khsawsayt hay jo byrwny fnkshn kay bad 123456 waps aanay kay bad bhi kesi fnkshn ko byrwny fnkshn sy mtghyr tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، ayk bndsh ayk aysa fnkshn hay jo is jghha sy mtghyrat ko yad krta hay jahan is ki taryf ki jati hay ، ktaa nzar is sy ktaa nzar keh isy bad main anjam diya jata haay۔yhaan ayk msaal hay keh bndsh ko kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay: fnkshn aaؤt fynkshn () {const name = 'John' ؛fnkshn innerfunction () {knswl.lagh (`haylw ، $ {nam}!`) ؛inner enternfunction ؛} constrabeling = aaؤt fnkshn () ؛ mbarkbad () ؛// aaؤt pt: haylw ، jan! is msaal main ، aaؤt fynkshn () waps aanay wala anrfkshn () ، js main aaؤt fnkshn () main nam kay mtghyr tak rsaiy haasal haay۔aghrchha aaؤt fynkshn () waps aaghya hay ، is kay bawjwd ، band hony ka shkryha ، nam mtghyr tak tak rsaiy haasal haay۔jb slam () kaha jata hay ، tou yeh haylw lagh un hawta hay ، jan!knswl kay liay۔ klwzawr aksar jawa askrpt main dayta praiywysy ، ankpswlyshn ، aur fyktry kay afaal 123456 bnanay kay liye astamal kyay jatay hayn۔an ka astamal aywnt kay hayndalrza ، kal byks ، aur aaly aardar kay afaal bnanay kay liye bhi kya jaskta haay۔jawa askrpt prwghramngh main bndshwn ko smjhna ayk aham tsawr hay

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taipl wrasat kesay kam krty haay؟prwtw taip zanjyr kay tsawr ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: prwtw taipl wrasat jawa askrpt main ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo ashyaa ko dyghr ashyaa sy khsawsayat aur tarykwn ka warsa hony ki ajazat dyta haay۔jawa askrpt main ، hr shay ki ayk njy praprty hawty hay jsay [[prwtw taip]] kaha jata hay ، jo kesi aur shay ki taraf asharha krta hay jsay is kay prwtw taip 123 kaha jata haay۔jb kesi shay par kesi praprty ya tarykha kar tak rsaiy haasal ki jati hay tou ، jawa askrpt pehlay is ki tlash main hi isy tlash krta haay۔aghr yeh nahin mila hay tou ، yeh is chyza ko aabjykt kay prwtw taip par tlash krta haay۔aghr yeh ab bhi nahin mila hay tou ، yeh is ko prwtw taip kay prwtw taip par tlash krta hay ، aur isi tarah ، jab tak keh yeh prwtw taip chyn 123 kay akhttam tak nahin phanch jata haay۔ yahan par prwtwtaip ki zanjyrwn kay kam karnay ki ayk msaal haay۔: 30 ، mbarkbad: fnkshn () {knswl.lwgh (`haylw ، mera nam $ {this.name} hay aur main $ {this.age} sal ki amr main hawn۔) ؛}} ؛ kanst taalb alm = {myjr: 'kmpywtr sains' ، __proto__: shkhsa} ؛ taalb alm۔ ghryt () ؛// aaؤt pt: haylw ، mera nam jan hay aur main 30 sal ka hawn۔ is msaal main ، taalb alm ayk aysy chyza hay jo __proto__ praprty kay zaryaay shkhsa sy khsawsayat aur tarykwn ko wrasat main mlty haay۔jb taalb alm. ghryt () ko blaya jata hay tou ، jawa askrpt pehlay taalb alm par mbarkbad kay tarykha kar ki tlash krta haay۔chwnkha yeh nahin paya jata hay ، lhazaa yeh is shkhsa par tlash krta hay ، jahan isy paya jata hay aur is par aml draamd hawta haay۔ prwtwtaip chynngh jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo ashyaa ko khsawsayat aur tarykwn ko bantnay ، kwda ki nkl ko kam karnay aur kwda ko zayada mwsar bnanay ki ajazat dyty haay۔taham ، agar ahatyata sy astamal nahin kya gaya tou yeh ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bhi bn sakta haay۔yha smjhna keh kis tarah prwtw taip chynngh kam krta hay mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye aham haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main wakaha ka lwp kya haay؟yha ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko kis tarah snbhalta haay؟
Answer: aywnt lwp jawa askrpt main ayk aysa tarykha kar hay jo kwda par aml draamd ka antzaam krta hay aur asynkrwns aapryshnza 123456 ko snbhalta haay۔jawa askrpt ayk wahad thrydada zaban hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh yeh ayk wkt main sirf ayk kam par amldraamd krskta haay۔taham ، yeh aywnt lwp ka astamal krkay ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko snbhal sakta haay۔aywnt lwp kay kam karnay ka tarykha yeh haay: kal astyk: jab kesi fnkshn ko kaha jata hay tou ، isy kal astyk main shaml kya jata haay۔kal astyk ayk dayta dahanchha hay jo fy alhaal un afaal ko tryk krta hay jo fy alhaal phansy di jarhay hayn۔ WEB APIs: jab ayk mtzuad fnkshn kaha jata hay tou ، isy wyb API main bhyja jata hay ، jo braؤzar main ayk blt un API haay۔wyb API apna ayk wahad thryda aapryshn shrwa krta hay aur prwsysngh kay liye aapryshn ko waps bhyjnay kay liye mkhsawsa wkt ka antzaar krta haay۔ kal byk ktaar: jab wyb API aapryshn waps bhyjta hay tou ، isy kal byk ktaar main shaml kya jata haay۔kal byk ktaar ayk dayta dahanchha hay js main afaal ko anjam diya jata hay jo amldraamd kay liye tyar hayn۔ aywnt lwp: aywnt lwp mstkl tawr par kal astyk aur kal byk ktaar ki janch pratal krta haay۔aghr kal astyk khaly hay tou ، yeh kal byk ktaar sy pehla fnkshn lyta hay aur isy kal astyk main shaml krta haay۔as kay bad fnkshn par aml draamd kya jata haay۔ rypyt: aywnt ka lwp kal astyk aur kal byk ktaar ki janch pratal jary rakhy hoey hay ، is aml ko dharata hay jab tak keh kal byk ktaar main mazeed kam nah hawn۔ prwtwtaip chynngh jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo ashyaa ko khsawsayat ko bantnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔awr tarykay ، kwda ki nkl ko kam karna aur kwda ko zayada mwsar bnana۔taham ، agar ahatyata sy astamal nahin kya gaya tou yeh ghair mtwka slwk ka baasa bhi bn sakta haay۔yha smjhna keh kis tarah prwtw taip chynngh kam krta hay mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye aham haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main wadwn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ko kis tarah mtzuad prwghramngh kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: ayk wadha ayk khasa jawa askrpt aabjykt hay jo hatmy tkmyl ya ghair mtzalzal aapryshn 12345 ki nakamy ki nmaindghy krta haay۔wadwn ka astamal ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko snbhalnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay kesi API sy dayta lana ، aur woh jdyd jawa askrpt dawylpmnt 12345 main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hayn۔wyb ayply kyshnza main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay kay liye waday aham hain ، aur yeh smjhna zurwry hay keh woh kis tarah kam karty hain aur aap kay kwda 12345 main un ka astamal kesay karain ghay۔ yahan wadha karna wadha krna: wadha knstrktr ka astamal karty hoey ayk wadha tkhlyk kya gaya haay۔knstrktr ayk fnkshn lyta hay jsay ayghzayktr fnkshn kaha jata hay ، jo do pyramytrza lyta haay: hal aur mstrd kryn۔hal kay fnkshn ko is wkt kaha jata hay jab ghair mtzalzal aapryshn kamyab hawta hay ، aur jab aapryshn nakam hawjata hay tou mstrd hony waly fnkshn ko kaha jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh ghair mtzalzal aapryshn abhi tak mkml nahin hoa haay۔ pori ryast: jab mtzuad aapryshn kamyab hawta hay tou ، azam ki tkryb ko kaha jata hay ، aur wadha pora hawta haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aapryshn kamyaby kay sath mkml hochuka hay ، aur yeh wadha aapryshn kay ntyjay main waps aajata haay۔ ryjyktda ryast: jab ghair mtzalzal aapryshn nakam hawjata hay tou ، mstrd fnkshn ko blaya jata hay ، aur wadha mstrd krdya jata haay۔as ka mtalb yeh hay keh aapryshn nakam hochuka hay ، aur wadha ayk ghltay ko waps krta haay۔yha tarykha pyramytrza kay btawr do kam lyta haay: mkml aur tndrst۔jb wadha pora hawta hay tou is ki tkmyl shuda fnkshn ko kaha jata hay ، aur jab wadha mstrd hawjata hay tou is sy mtalk fnkshn kaha jata haay۔ jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal aapryshnwn ko snbhalnay kay liye pysh ghwiyan astamal ki jati hayn۔an ka astamal kwda ko aasan bnanay aur isy mazeed prahnay kay kabl bnanay kay liye kya jaskta haay۔wadwn ka astamal kesi API sy dayta lanay ، saarf kay un pt ko snbhalnay ، aur bohat sy dusray astamal kay maamlat kay liye kya jaskta haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟kwshsh kych fainl byan ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main ، kwshshyn kych fainl byan 123456 ka astamal karty hoey ghltayan aur mstsanyat ko snbhala jaskta haay۔aazamaishy blak main kwda hawta hay jo ghltay ya astsanaa ka sbb bn sakta haay۔aghr koi ghltay waka hawty hay tou ، kych blak par aml draamd hawta hay ، js main ghltay ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda hawta haay۔aakhr main blak par aml draamd kya jata hay is sy ktaa nzar keh koi ghltay waka hawty hay ya nhayn۔yhaan kwshsh hay keh kwshsh kych-fainl byan kis tarah kam krta haay: aazamaiyn blak: aazamaishy blak main kwda hawta hay js ki wjha sy kesi ghltay ya astsanaa ka sbb bn sakta haay۔as main ghltay ko snbhalnay kay liye kwda mwjwd haay۔kych blak pyramytr kay tawr par ghltay ka aabjykt lyta hay ، js main ghltay kay baray main malwmat hawty haay۔as main woh kwda shaml hay js ko aazamaishy blak kay ntaij sy ktaa nzar is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔ yahan kwshsh ki janay wali ayk msaal hay keh kis tarah tr kych fainl byan ko astamal kya jaskta haay: kwshsh karain {// kwda js main ghltay ka ntyjha hawskta hay = 10 / '۔haylw'؛knswl.lagh (ntyjha) ؛} kych (ghltay) {// ghltay kwnswl ko snbhalnay kay liye {// kwda ('ayk ghltay waka hui haay:' ، ghltay) ؛} aakhr {// kwda js ko ntaij knswl sy ktaa nzar is par aml draamd karnay ki zurwrt haay۔.log ('as kwda ko hamyshha aml main laya jaye gha۔') ؛} is msaal main ، aazamaishy blak main kwda mwjwd hay js main ghltay ka sbb bn sakta haay۔aghr koi ghltay waka hawty hay tou ، kych blak par aml draamd hawta hay ، jo knswl main ghltay ka pygham lagh un krta haay۔aakhr main blak par aml draamd kya jata hay is sy ktaa nzar keh koi ghltay waka hawty hay ya nahin ، jo knswl ko pygham lagh un krta haay۔ kwshsh kych fainl byan jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo aap ko ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko khwbsawrty sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔aap kay kwda main ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko snbhalna zurwry hay takha aap ki drkhwast ko krysh hony sy bchaya jaskay aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham kya jaskay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main tyr kay fnkshn kya hayn؟wha bakaadha afaal sy kesay mkhtlf hayn؟
Answer: yrw afaal ES6 main mtaarf kraiy janay wali ayk niy khsawsayt hain jo fnkshn kay azahaar 123456 lkhnay kay liye zayada jama nhaw fraham krty hayn۔wha mtadd tarykwn sy bakaadha afaal sy mkhtlf hayn: nhaw: tyr kay afaal main bakaadha afaal sy kam nhaw hawta haay۔wha fnkshn ki wrda ki bjaiay => aaprytr astamal karty hayn۔msaal kay tawr pr: // bakaadha fnkshn fnkshn shaml karain (a ، b) a + b ؛} // yrw fnkshnkwnst shaml karain = (a ، b) => a + b ؛ is klydy lfza: tyr kay afaal main is ki apni mtalwbha alfaza nahin hayn۔as kay bjaiay ، woh aas pas kay kwda sy is kdr kay warsa hayn۔as sy woh ashyaa aur aywnt kay hayndalrza kay sath kam karnay kay l useful mfyd haay۔dwsry taraf ، bakaadha afaal ka apna apna klydy lfza hawta hay ، jo kuch haalat main aljhn main pra sakta haay۔as kay bjaiay ، woh aas pas kay kwda kay dlail aabjykt ka astamal karty hayn۔bakaadha afaal main un kay apnay dlail aabjykt hawtay hain ، jo mtghyr tadad kay dlail kay sath kam karnay kay liye karaamd saabt hawsktay hayn۔ dwbarha byan: tyr kay afaal main wapsy ki ayk khasa khsawsayt haay۔aghr fnkshn jsm ayk hi azahaar par mushtamil hawta hay tou ، fnkshn is azahaar ko lwtata haay۔bakaadghy sy afaal ko kesi kdr ko waps karnay kay liye wapsy kay byan ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ kwshsh kych fainl byan jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr khsawsayt hay jo aap ko ghltaywn aur mstsanyat ko ahasn tarykay sy snbhalnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔aap kay kwda main ghltaywn aur astsanaa ko snbhalna zurwry hay takha aap ki drkhwast ko krysh hony sy bchaya jaskay aur saarf ka bhatr tjrbha fraham kya jaskay۔

Question: "aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad prwghramngh ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟ kal byks ، wadwn ، aur async/antzaar kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔"
Answer: jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ayk lazmi tsawr hay ، aur isy snbhalnay kay mkhtlf tarykay hayn۔jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay kay tyn aham tarykay yeh hayn: kal byks: kal byk ayk fnkshn hay jo kesi aur fnkshn ki dlyl kay tawr par mnzawr kya jata hay jo ps mnzar main kesi kam ko anjam dena shrwa krday gha۔jb ps mnzar ka kam chl raha hay tou ، yeh kal byk fnkshn ko kal krta hay takha aap ko ntyjha 123456 kay baray main aaghaha kya jaskay۔kal byks jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay ka kdym trien tarykha haay۔wadwn ka astamal ghair mtzalzal karrwaiywn ko snbhalnay kay liye kya jata hay ، jesay kesi API sy dayta lana ، aur woh jdyd jawa askrpt dawylpmnt 123456 main braay pymanay par astamal hawtay hayn۔waday kal byk byk kay mkablay main ghair snjydha prwghramngh ko snbhalnay ka ayk saaf sthra aur zayada lchkdar tarykha fraham karty hayn۔ aay ays ayn sy/antzaar kryn: ASYNC/antzaar jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay ka ayk nya tarykha haay۔yha wadwn kay awpry hasaay par bnaya gaya hay aur asynkrwns aapryshnza 123456 ko snbhalnay kay liye ayk saaf sthra aur zayada jama nhaw fraham krta haay۔Async/antzaar karna ghair mtzalzal kwda ko lkhna aur prahna aasan bnata hay ، khasa tawr par jab mtadd wadwn sy nmtnay kay liay۔ khlasaha ، kal byks ، wadwn ، aur Async/Await jawa askrpt main ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay kay tyn aham tarykay hayn۔kal byks ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ko snbhalnay ka sab sy kdym tarykha hay ، jabky waday aur Async/antzaar karnay waly asynchronous prwghramngh ko snbhalnay kay klynr aur zayada lchkdar tarykay mhaya karty hayn۔

Question: "jawa askrpt main lyt ، kanst ، aur wy aar main kya frk haay؟ aap hr ayk ko kab astamal karain ghay؟"
Answer: aaiyay ، kanst ، aur wy aar sab jawa askrpt main mtghyrat ka aalan karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh apnay tarza aml aur astamal main mkhtlf hayn۔lyt ، kanst ، aur wy aar kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: dairha kar: lyt aur kanst blak askwpda hain ، js ka mtalb hay keh woh sirf is blak kay andr hi kabl rsaiy hain jn main woh aalan kyay jatay hain ، jabky wr fnkshn askwpda hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh yeh kabl rsaiy haay۔fnkshn kay andr is ka aalan 123456 main kya jata haay۔aaiyay aur mtghyr mtghyrat ko lharaya nahin jata hay ، is ka mtalb yeh hay keh un ka astamal 123456 ka aalan karnay sy pehlay nahin kya jaskta haay۔var mtghyrat ko dwbarha tfwyzu kya jaskta haay۔mtghyr js ko bad main dwbarha tfwyzu kya jaskta haay۔ astamal karain jab aap ko kesi mtghyr ka aalan karnay ki zurwrt hawty hay js ko dwbarha tfwyzu nahin kya jaskta۔ jab aap ko pranay braؤzarza ki hamayt karnay ki zurwrt ho ya jab aap ko kesi mtghyr ka aalan karnay ki zurwrt ho jo is main kabl rsaiy hay js main is ka aalan kya jata haay۔khlasaha ، aaiyay ، kanst ، aur wy aar jawa askrpt main mtghyrat ka aalan karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin woh apnay tarza aml aur astamal main mkhtlf hayn۔aaiyay aur kanst blak askwpda hain ، jabky wr fnkshn askwpda haay۔aaiyay mtghyrat ko dwbarha tfwyzu kya jaskta hay ، jabky mtghyrat ko dwbarha tfwyzu nahin kya jaskta haay۔jb un ka aalan kya jata hay tou woh mtghyrat ko shrwa karna zurwry hay

Question: jawa askrpt main lghwy askwpngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh kis tarah mtghyr mriyt ko mtasar krta haay۔
Answer: lghwy askwpngh jawa askrpt main ayk bnyady tsawr hay jo prwghram 123456 main mtghyr aur afaal ki mriyt ka tayn krta haay۔as sy mrad is tarah sy hay keh jab kesi fnkshn kay andr koi fnkshn tshkyl diya jata hay tou jawa askrpt mtghyr namwn ko hal krta haay۔yha yeh dykh kar fnkshn kay waldyn ki ghnjaish ka tayn krta hay keh is ki bjaiay fnkshn kahan bnaiy hogi thi jahan is ki drkhwast ki hogi thy۔lghwy askwpngh kay baray main kuch klydy nkat yeh hayn: lghwy askwpngh ko jamd askwpngh kay nam sy bhi jana jata haay۔ jawa askrpt ayk khasa askwp main mtghyrat ko kabl rsaiy tlash karnay kay liye askwp chyn kaha jata hay ، js ko askwp chyn kaha jata haay۔waldyn kay askwps tak jary rhata hay jab tak keh woh aalmy dairha kar tak nah phanchay aur mtghyr ko paiay۔ kesi fnkshn kay bahar aalan krdha mtghyr aalmy mtghyrat hain aur prwghram main kahain bhi tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔ kesi fnkshn kay andr aalan krdha mkhtlf mtghyrat hain aur sirf is main tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty hay aur is tak rsaiy haasal ki jaskty haay۔yha fnkshn۔ fnkshn un kay waldyn kay askwp sy aalmy dairha kar tak mtghyrat tak rsaiy haasal krsktay hain ، lekin is kay andr byan krdha afaal sy koi ghnjaish mtghyr tak rsaiy haasal nahin krskty haay۔ jyw skrpt main bndshwn main lyksykl askwpngh bohat zayada astamal hawty haay۔jawa askrpt jo kesi prwghram main mtghyr aur afaal ki mriyt ka tayn krta haay۔as sy mrad is tarah sy hay keh jab kesi fnkshn kay andr koi fnkshn tshkyl diya jata hay tou jawa askrpt mtghyr namwn ko hal krta haay۔mؤsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye lghwy askwpngh ko smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main dawm (dstawyza aabjykt madal) ko kis tarah jwra twra karty hayn؟dawm hayra phyry ki karrwaiywn ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main dawm hayra phyry ayk HTML dstawyza ko tbdyl karnay ya is main trmym karnay kay liye DOM API kay sath bat chyt karnay ka aml hay jo wyb braؤzar main zaahar hawgha۔dawm main jwra twra krkay ، hum aysay wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hain jo safhaay ko tazaha dm kyay baghair wyb pyj main mwjwd dayta ko ap dayt karty hain aur ryfrysh 123456 kay baghair is ki trtyb ko tbdyl krsktay hayn۔dawm hayra phyry ki karrwaiywn ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: anasar ka antkhab: hum dawm main anasar ko mntkhb krsktay hain jesay mkhtlf tarykwn jesay ghytylymnt baiy aai day () ، ghytylymnt baiklas nam () ، ghytylymnt bai tygh nam () ، astfsar slyktr () ، wghyrha۔ yeh tarykay mntkhb krdha ka hawalha waps karty hayn۔ansar ، jo ansar ko jwranay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ ansar pyda karnay kay liay: hum krytylymnt () tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dawm main niay anasar tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔yha tarykha mkhsawsa tygh nam kay sath ayk nya ansar tshkyl dyta hay aur niay ansar ka hawalha waps krta haay۔as kay bad hum zumymha () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey dawm main niay ansar ko shaml krsktay hayn۔tykst kntynt praprty kesi ansar kay tykst mwad ko syt ya lwtaty hay ، jabky andrwny aych ty aym ayl praprty kesi ansar kay HTML mwad ko syt krty hay ya lwtaty haay۔ dwbarha kam karnay waly anasar: hum hatanay waly ()) kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey DOM sy anasar ko hata saktay hayn۔yha tarykha dawm sy bchay kay nwda ko hata dyta hay aur hataiay gaye nwda ka hawalha waps krta haay۔ astailngh anasar: hum astail praprty ka astamal karty hoey kesi ansar kay andaza ko tbdyl krsktay hayn۔yha praprty hamain kesi ansar ki ayk mkhsawsa sy ays ays praprty ki kymt mrtb karnay ya waps karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ aywnt kay snnay walon ko shaml karty hayn: hum aywnt snnay walon ko aydawnt lstnr () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karty hoey anasar main shaml krsktay hayn۔as tarykha kar sy aywnt kay snnay walon ko kesi ansar main shaml kya jata hay aur jab is wakaay ko mthark kya jata hay tou is ki wzuahat ki jati haay۔ khlasaha main ، jawa askrpt main dawm hayra phyry main dawm main anasar main anasar kay sath aywnt kay snnay walon ko mntkhb karna ، tkhlyk karna ، trmym karna ، hatana ، astail karna shaml haay۔dawm main jwra twra krkay ، hum mthark aur antrayktw wyb ayply kyshnza tshkyl dy saktay hayn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main aywnt ka wfd kya haay؟yha kesay kam krta hay aur is kay kya fwaid hayn؟
Answer: aywnt ka wfd jawa askrpt main ayk tknyk hay jo aap ko ayk hi wakaha snnay waly kay sath mtadd anasar kay wakaat ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔har ansar main aywnt snnay walon ko shaml karnay kay bjaiay ، aap kesi ayk wakaha snnay waly ko waldyn kay ansar main shaml karty hain aur is kay bchwn kay anasar 123456 par wakaat ko snbhalnay kay liye aywnt ki blblngh ka astamal karty hayn۔aywnt kay wfd kay astamal kay kuch fwaid yeh hayn: bhatr karkrdghy aur kam mymwry ka astamal: aywnt kay wfd ka astamal krkay ، aap kesi safhaay par wakaha kay snnay walon ki tadad ko kam krsktay hain ، jo karkrdghy ko bhatr bnasktay hain aur aap ki drkhwast ki mymwry kay astamal ko kam krsktay hayn۔: aywnt ka wfd aap ko mthark tawr par shaml anasar par wakaat ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jo AJAX ya dusray mthark mwad kay sath kam karty wkt mfyd saabt hawskta haay۔wakaha ka wfd kis tarah kam krta haay: // waldyn kay ansar dawkywmnt main ayk prk aywnt snnay wala shaml kryn۔.target && aywnt.tarjt.mchys ('. chailda')) {// bchwn kay ansar knswl par wakaha ko snbhalyn۔waldyn kay ansar par wakaha snnay walon par klk karain aur yeh chyk karnay kay liye mychza () kay tarykha kar ka astamal karain keh aya klyk ansar bchwn ka ansar hay ya nhayn۔aghr yeh hay tou ، hum aywnt ko chailda ansar par snbhaltay hayn۔ aywnt wfd jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo aap ko ayk hi wakaha snnay waly kay sath mtadd anasar kay wakaat ko snbhalnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔yha karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakta hay ، kwda ko aasan bna sakta hay ، aur aap ki ayply kyshn ko mazeed mthark bna sakta haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main farm ki twsayk ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟farm ki twsayk ki tknyk ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: farm ki twsayk wyb dawylpmnt ka ayk lazmi hasaha hay jo ykyny bnata hay keh saarf kay zaryaha dakhl krdha dayta drst hay aur mkhsawsa mayar ko pora krta haay۔jawa askrpt farm ki twsayk kay l several kiy tknyk mhaya krta hay ، bshmwl: bnyady twsayk: bnyady twsayk ki janch pratal krty hay keh aya tamam lazmi shabwn ko pُr kya gaya haay۔ is main hr fylda ko farm main lwpngh ki zurwrt hawty hay aur dayta 123456. dayta farmyt ki twsayk: dayta farmyt ki twsayk ki janch pratal nahin ki jati hay ya nhayndrj kya sahayha shkl aur kdr main haay۔dayta 123456.html5 twsayk ki drstghy ko janchnay kay liye mnasb mntak ki zurwrt hawty haay: HTML5 blt un farm ki twsayk ki khsawsayat fraham krta hay jo farm dayta ko drst karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔as twsayk main jawa askrpt ki twsayk sy bhatr karkrdghy hay ، lekin yeh btawr hasb zurwrt 6 nahin haay۔ jawa askrpt ki twsayk: jawa askrpt ki twsayk ayk klaint saiyda ki twsayk ki tknyk hay jsay srwr ko jma krwanay sy pehlay farm dayta ko drst karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔yha saarf ko fwry aaraa fraham krta hay aur mkhsawsa tkazuwn ko pora karnay kay liye apni mrzuy kay mtaabk bnaya jaskta hay ۔123456. jawa askrpt ki shkl ko kis tarah anjam denay ki ayk msaal haay: fnkshn kwitytytfarm () {CONT nam = dstawyzaat۔؛aghr (nam == "") {alrt ("nam ko pُr karna zurwry haay") ؛jhwta waps ؛Email ay myl = dstawyzaat۔aghr (ay myl == "") {alrt ("ay myl ko pُr karna zurwry haay") ؛jhwta waps ؛passion pas wrda = dstawyzaat۔ shklyn ["maiyfarm"] ["pas wrda"]aghr (pas wrda == "") {alrt ("pas wrda ko pُr karna zurwry haay") ؛jhwta waps ؛confort confornassword = dstawyzaat۔aghr (tsadyk pas wrda == "") {alrt ("tsadyk pas wrda ko pُr karna zurwry haay") ؛jhwta waps ؛} agar (pas wrda! = tsadyk pas wrda) {alrt ("pas wrda mmasal nahin hawtay") ؛jhwta waps ؛true schaiy waps ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain js ko wylywytytfarm () kaha jata hay jo chyk krta hay keh aya nam ، ay myl ، pas wrda ، aur is ki tsadyk pas wrda kay fyldaza ko pُr kya gaya hay aur aya pas wrdaza mmasal hain ya nhayn۔aghr kesi bhi fylda ko pُr nahin kya gaya hay ya pas wrda mmasal nahin hain tou ، ayk alrt pygham zaahar hawta hay ، aur fnkshn ghalat lwtata haay۔aghr tamam fyldaza ko pُr kya gaya hay aur pas wrdaza mmasal hain tou ، fnkshn sch waps aajata haay۔ khlasaha yeh keh ، farm ki twsayk wyb dawylpmnt ka ayk lazmi hasaha hay jo is bat ko ykyny bnata hay keh saarf kay zaryaha dakhl krdha dayta drst hay aur mkhsawsa mayar par pora atrta haay۔jawa askrpt farm ki twsayk kay liye mtadd tknyk fraham krta hay ، bshmwl bnyady twsayk ، dayta farmyt ki twsayk ، HTML5 twsayk ، aur jawa askrpt ki twsayk۔

Question: jawa askrpt main aaly aardar kay afaal kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un kay astamal ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: aaly aardar kay afaal aysay afaal hain jo ayk ya zayada afaal ko dlail kay tawr par lytay hain ya kesi fnkshn ko un kay ntaij 123456 kay tawr par lwtatay hayn۔wha jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr tsawr hain jo zayada madaywlr ، dwbarha kabl astamal aur lchkdar kwda ki ajazat dyta haay۔an kay astamal ki kuch msaalyn yeh hayn: nkshha: nkshha () ka tarykha ayk aaly aardar ka fnkshn hay jo mwjwdha saf kay hr ansar par kesi fnkshn ka atalak krkay ayk niy saf tyar krta haay۔yha ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk fnkshn lyta hay aur hr ansar 123456 par fnkshn ka atalak karnay kay ntaij kay sath ayk niy saf lwtata haay۔ fltr: fltr () ka tarykha ayk aaly aardar ka fnkshn hay jo ayk niy saf ko tyar krta hay jo un tamam anasar kay sath hawta hay jo ayk tyst ko nafza karty hayn۔fraham krdha fnkshn kay zaryaha۔yha ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk fnkshn lyta hay aur un anasar kay sath ayk niy saf lwtata hay jo TEST123456 ko mntkl karty hayn۔ reduce: kam () tarykha ayk aaly aardar ka fnkshn hay jo kesi ayk kdr main kam karnay kay liye kesi saf kay hr ansar par ayk fnkshn ka atalak krta haay۔yha ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk fnkshn lyta hay aur ayk hi kymt ko lwtata hay jo hr ansar 123456 par fnkshn ko laghw karnay ka ntyjha haay۔ kal byks: kal byks aysay kam hain jo dusray afaal ko dlail kay tawr par mnzawr kyay jatay hain aur jab koi khasa wakaha pysh aata hay tou is par amldraamd kya jata haay۔wha aam tawr par ghair mtzalzal prwghramngh ، aywnt hayndalngh ، aur dyghr mnzarnamwn main astamal hawtay hain jahan amldraamd kay hakm ki zumant nahin hay 123456. klwza: bndshyn aysay afaal hain jn kay byrwny dairha kar main mtghyr tak rsaiy hawty hay ، yahan tak keh byrwny fnkshn waps aanay kay bad bhy۔wha aam tawr par jawa askrpt 123456 main njy mtghyrat aur afaal pyda karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔ khlasaha main ، aaly aardar kay afaal jawa askrpt main ayk taaktwr tsawr hain jo zayada madaywlr ، dwbarha kabl astamal aur lchkdar kwda ki ajazat dyta haay۔wha aam tawr par nkshha () ، fltr () ، aur kam () kay sath sath kal byks aur bndshwn main bhi srny tarykwn main astamal hawtay hayn۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main ayjyks ki drkhwastyn kesay karty hayn؟XMLHTTPrequest kay astamal ki wzuahat karain aur API bazayaft kryn۔

Question: jawa askrpt main bndshwn aur madaywl pytrn kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur un ka astamal njy mtghyrat aur ankpswlyshn ko bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: bndsh aur madaywl ka nmwnha jawa askrpt main do aham tsawrat hain jo njy mtghyrat aur ankpswlyshn bnanay kay liye astamal hawsktay hayn۔ klwzar: ayk bndsh ayk aysa fnkshn hay js main byrwny fnkshn waps aanay kay bad bhi ، is kay byrwny (mnslk) fnkshn main mtghyr tak rsaiy hawty haay۔fnkshn tkhlyk kay wkt ، jab bhi ayk fnkshn tyar kya jata hay tou bndsh pyda ki jati haay۔ klwzawr ko jawa askrpt main njy mtghyrat aur afaal bnanay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔ klwza ko madaywlr aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ klwzar tyar kyay jatay hain jab kesi fnkshn ki wzuahat ki jati hay ، jab nahin jab aysa nahin hawta haay۔aml main laya jata haay۔ madal pytrn: madaywl pytrn jawa askrpt main ayk dayzaain ka nmwnha hay jo aap ko njy mtghyrat aur afaal bnanay aur apnay kwda kay dusray hasawn ko astamal karnay kay liye awamy API ko bay nkab karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ madaywl pytrn njy mtghyrat aur afaal ko bnanay kay liye bndsh ka astamal krta haay۔madaywl pytrn kesi ayk shay kay andr srkary aur njy tarykwn aur mtghyrat kay mrkb ko lpytnay ka ayk tarykha fraham krta hay ، is tarah khasa hasawn ko aalmy askwp sy bchata haay۔ madaywl pytrn ko madaywlr aur dwbarha kabl astamal kwda bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ madaywl pytrn ko nafza kya jaskta haay۔fwry tawr par paiay janay waly fnkshn azahaar (IIFE) ka astamal karty hawiay۔ yahan njy mtghyrat aur encapsulation bnanay kay liye madaywl pytrn ko kis tarah astamal kya jaye is ki ayk msaal haay: mymodule = (fnkshn () const {praiywytwr = 0 ؛fnkshn praiywyt fnkshn () Question: jawa askrpt main fnkshn kryngh kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur isy dwbarha astamal kay kabl fnkshn fyktrywn ko bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔

dlail ko afaal ki ayk syryza main la jati hay js main hr ayk sirf ayk dlyl lyta haay۔ntyjay main aanay waly afaal ko pehlay sy syt dlail kay sath niay afaal pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aur tkrar 123456 ko kam karna aasan hawjata haay۔ dwbarha astamal kay kabl fnkshn fyktry bnanay kay liye fnkshn kryngh ko kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay: fnkshn zurb (x) {wapsyfnkshn (y) {x * y ؛} ؛} knst dabl = zurb (2) ؛ Const trpl = zurb (3) ؛ knswl.lwgh (dabl (5)) ؛// aaؤt pt: 10console.log (trpl (5)) ؛// aaؤt pt: 15 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum dwbarha kabl astamal fnkshn fyktry bnanay kay liye fnkshn kryngh ka astamal karty hain jo pehlay sy taay shuda kymt sy ayk nmbr ko brahata haay۔zurb () fnkshn ayk nmbr X lyta hay aur ayk nya fnkshn lwtata hay jo dusra nmbr y lyta hay aur isy ayks kay zaryaha zurb dyta haay۔as kay bad hum zurb () fnkshn ko do niay afaal pyda karnay kay liye astamal karty hain ، dabl aur trpl ، jo baltrtyb 2 aur 3 ki tadad ko zurb dytay hayn۔ fnkshn kryngh ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jsay dwbarha astamal kay kabl fnkshn fyktrywn ko bnanay aur kwda main tkrar ko kam karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta haay۔ksy aysay fnkshn ko twranay sy jo mtadd dlail ko ayk slslha main la jata hay js main hr ayk sirf ayk hi dlyl lyta hay ، dawylpr pehlay sy syt dlail kay sath niay afaal tshkyl dy saktay hain ، js sy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aur tkrar ko kam karna aasan hawjata haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، fnkshn kryngh ayk tknyk haay۔jawa askrpt main jo dawylprza ko kesi aysay fnkshn ko twra kar dwbarha kabl astamal fnkshn fyktrywn ko bnanay ki ajazat dyta hay jo mtadd dlail ko afaal ki ayk syryza main la jata hay js main sy hr ayk sirf ayk hi dlyl lyta haay۔ntyjay main aanay waly afaal ko pehlay sy syt dlail kay sath niay afaal pyda karnay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، js sy kwda ko dwbarha astamal karna aur tkrar ko kam karna aasan hawjata haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kras-arghyn ryswrs shyirngh (CORS) ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟CORS haydar aur CORS- kabl drkhwastwn kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt kras awryghyn ryswrs shyirngh (CORS) main kras awryghyn ryswrs shyirngh (CORS) wyb braؤzarza main ayk hafazaty khsawsayt hay jo wyb safhaat ko wyb pyj ki khdmt kay mkablay main kesi mkhtlf dawmyn main drkhwastwn ko drkhwast denay sy rwkty haay۔kars ko braؤzar kay zaryaha nafza kya jata hay ، jo srwr ko srwr ko HTTP haydarwn ka ayk syt bhyjta hay takha is bat ka tayn kya jaskay keh srwr ko drkhwast ki ajazat deni chahaiay ya nhayn۔jawa askrpt main CORS ko kis tarah snbhala jaskta haay: 1۔CORS haydar: CORS haydar HTTP haydar hain jo srwr ko is bat ki nshandhay karnay ki ajazat dytay hain keh kon sy dawmynza ، askymwn ، ya bndrghahawn ko is kay wsail 123456 tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat haay۔ rsaiy kntrwl-all wwrn haydar ko yeh btanay kay liye astamal kya jata hay keh kon sy dawmynza ko srwr kay wsail 123456 tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat haay۔.sys kntrwl-alw-mythwdas haydar ka astamal yeh btanay kay liye kya jata hay keh ryswrs 123456 kay liye kon sy HTTP tarykwn ki ajazat haay۔asalyt: *rsaiy kntrwl-alw kay tarykha kar: haasal karain ، pwst karain ، pwt ، daylytykys-kntrwl-aaby haydar: mwad ki ksm ki is msaal kay tawr par ، rsaiy kntrwl all wwrn haydar kesi bhi dawmyn ko srwr kay wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat dyta hay ، jbkhaayksys kntrwl all wyly mytwdas haydar haasal karnay ، pwst ، daalnay aur tarykwn ko hazaf karnay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ayksys kntrwl all way haydarza haydar mwad ki ksm kay haydar 2 ki ajazat dyta haay۔CORS- kabl drkhwastwn: CORS- kabl drkhwastwn ki drkhwastyn aysy drkhwastyn hain jn main asal haydar shaml hawta hay ، jo dawmyn ki wzuahat krta hay jo drkhwast 123456 bna raha haay۔ is kay bad srwr tak rsaiy kay kntrwl-allw awrjyn haydar ka astamal krskta hay takha drkhwast 123456.Cors.orsors.cors.ors.ors.ors.ors.ors.cunterollollow-origin haydar ko astamal kya jaskta haay۔kabl drkhwast ki drkhwastyn XMLHTTPREQUEST aabjykt ya bazayaft () tarykha 123456.Const XHR = nya XMLHTTPREQUEST () ؛ XHR.open ('get' ، 'https://api.example.com/data') ؛ ayks aych aar ka astamal karty hoey ki jaskty hayn۔setRequestHeader ('asalyt' ، 'https://example.com') ؛ xhr.onload = fnkshn () {knswl.lwgh (xhr.responsetext) ؛} ؛ xhr.send () ؛ is msaal main ، hum xmlhtprequest astamal karty haynksy API ko CORS- kabl bnanay ki drkhwast karnay par aatrazu kryn۔ham nay asal haydar ko https://example.com par syt kya keh is dawmyn ki wzuahat kay liye jo drkhwast dy raha haay۔ khlasaha yeh hay keh ، kras awryghyn ryswrs shyirngh (CORS) wyb braؤzarza main ayk hafazaty khsawsayt hay jo wyb safhaat ko A sy drkhwastyn denay sy rwkty haay۔wyb pyj ki khdmt karnay waly sy mkhtlf dawmyn۔CORS haydar aur CORS- kabl drkhwastwn ka astamal karty hoey jawa askrpt main CORs ko snbhala jaskta haay۔CORS haydar HTTP haydar hain jo srwr ko is bat ki nshandhay karnay ki ajazat dytay hain keh kon sy dawmynza ، askymwn ya bndrghahawn ko is kay wsail tak rsaiy haasal karnay ki ajazat hay ، jabky CORS- kabl drkhwastwn main dawmyn ki wzuahat karnay kay liye asal haydar shaml hay jo drkhwast dy raha haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main wakaha sy chlnay wali prwghramngh kya haay؟aywnt kay snnay walon aur aywnt kay akhraj kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt aywnt sy chlnay waly prwghramngh main wakaha sy chlnay wali prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo wakaat aur un sy wabstha afaal ko snbhalnay par mrkwza haay۔as nmwnha main ، prwghram kay bhaaؤ ka tayn saarf kay taaml ، synsr aaؤt pt ، ya dusray prwghramwn ya thrydas 123456 kay pyghamat jesay wakaat sy hawta haay۔jawa askrpt main ، aywnt sy chlnay wali prwghramngh khasa tawr par saarf kay antrfys kay liye mnasb hay ، jahan saarf kay akdamat prwghram kay bhaaؤ ka tayn karty hayn۔ aywnt kay samayn aur aywnt aymytryn jawa askrpt ka astamal ، aywnt kay snnay walon aur aywnt aymytrza ko wakaat aur un sy wabstha afaal ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal kya jata haay۔snnay waly samayn: aywnt kay snnay waly aysay kam hawtay hain jo kesi khasa wakaha kay pysh aanay par kehty hayn۔jb aywnt waka hawta hay tou woh wakaat ko snnay aur aamal anjam denay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔) ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk btn ansar main wakaha snnay waly ko shaml karnay kay liye aydawnt lstnr () ka tarykha astamal karty hayn۔wakaha snnay wala ayk fnkshn hay jsay btn par klk karnay par kaha jata haay۔ Emitters: aywnt aymytrza aysy chyzayn hain jo wakaat ko kharj krty hain jab koi khasa aml hawta haay۔jb aywnt waka hawta hay tou woh wakaat ko mthark karnay aur snnay walon ko mtala karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔waka hoa ') ؛}) ؛ myemitter.emit (' wakaha ') ؛ is msaal main ، hum ayk nya wakaha aymytr aabjykt bnanay kay liye aywnt myttr klas ka astamal karty hayn۔as kay bad hum wakaha kay prwghram main aywnt snnay walon ko shaml karnay kay liye aan () tarykha astamal karty hayn۔aakhr main ، hum aywnt () kay tarykha kar ko aywnt kay wakaha ko mthark karnay aur snnay walon ko mtala karnay kay liye astamal karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، wakaha sy chlnay wali prwghramngh ayk prwghramngh nmwnha hay jo wakaat aur un sy wabstha afaal ko snbhalnay par mrkwza haay۔jawa askrpt main ، aywnt kay samayn aur aywnt aymytrza wakaat aur un sy wabstha afaal ko snbhalnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔wakaha kay snnay waly aysay kam hawtay hain jn ko kesi khasa wakaha kay pysh aanay par kaha jata hay ، jabky aywnt kay akhrajat aysy chyzayn hain jo kesi khasa karrwaiy kay waka hony par wakaat ka akhraj krty hayn۔mthark ، antrayktw wyb ayply kyshnza ki tshkyl kay liye aywnt kay snnay walon aur aywnt aymytrza kay sath kam karnay ka tarykha smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main tarykh aur wkt ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟tarykh aabjykt kay astamal aur aam tarykh main hayra phyry kay tarykwn ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: hayndalngh ki tarykh aur wkt jawa askrptyn jawa askrpt main ، tarykh ka aabjykt tarykh aur wkt kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔tarykh ka aabjykt mwjwdha tarykh aur wkt UTC main andrwny tawr par rkhta haay۔taham ، pehlay sy taay shuda tawr par ، jab hum tarykh aur wkt ko aaؤt pt karty hain tou ، tarykh ka aabjykt aaؤt pt ko mkamy taim zawn main tbdyl krta hay ، mahawl ka taim zawn jahan jawa askrpt kwda chl raha hay (jysay ، ayk braؤzar ، nwda۔ jay ays ، wghyrha)jb pyramytrza kay baghair anstynt kya jata hay tou ، tarykh aabjykt mwjwdha tarykh aur wkt (niy tarykh () mwjwdha tarykh rkhta haay) rkhta haay۔ham tarykh kay knstrktr main ya anstytywtyshn 12 kay bad tarykh aur wkt taay krsktay hayn۔ yahan tarykh main hayra phyry kay kuch aam tarykay hayn: getlyear (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh kay sal (4 handswn kay 4 handsay) ko waps krta haay۔tarykh = niy tarykh () const kanst sal = tarykh۔ ghytlyir () ؛ knswl.lagh (sal) ؛// aaؤt pt: 2023GETMONTH (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh ka mhaynha (0-11) waps krta haay۔// aaؤt pt: 5 ghyt dayt (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh kay liye mhaynay kay dn (1-31) ki wapsy۔) ؛// aaؤt pt: 22 ghyt daay (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh kay liye haftay kay dn (0-6) ki wapsy۔) ؛// aaؤt pt: 4 ghythwrs (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh main ghhntha (0-23) lwtata haay۔ kwnst tarykh = niy tarykh () ؛ kanstr ghhntay = tarykh.jythwrs () ؛ knswl.lagh (ghhntay) ؛// aaؤt pt: 14 ghyt mnts (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh main mnt (0-59) waps krta haay۔// aaؤt pt: 30 ghyt syknda (): mkamy wkt kay mtaabk mkhsawsa tarykh main syknda (0-59) waps krta haay۔// aaؤt pt: 45in ka khlasaha ، tarykh aabjykt jawa askrpt main tarykh aur wkt kay sath kam karnay kay liye astamal hawta haay۔aam tarykh main hayra phyry kay tarykwn main getllyear () ، getMonth () ، getDate () ، getday () ، gethours () ، getminutes () ، aur getsecond () shaml hayn۔jawa askrpt main bohat sy aam kamwn kay liye tarykhwn aur awkat kay sath kam karnay ka tarykha smjhna zurwry hay ، jesay kylndarza ، nzaam alawkat ، aur alty ghnty taimr ۔1dd2mozilla

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: jawa askrpt mymwzaaizayshn main mymwraizayshn jawa askrpt main ayk aysy tknyk hay js main mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko kychngh karna aur jab wahi aadanwn kay dwbarha hony par un ko waps karna shaml haay۔yha tknyk prwsysngh kay wkt ko nmayan tawr par kam krskty hay aur ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko bhatr bna sakti hay ، khasa tawr par jab bar bar aur bhary kmpywtngh kay afaal sy nmtnay kay liye 123456۔mwsyaizayshn ko fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay: fnkshn fbwnyky (ayn) {aghr (n <= 1) {wapsy n ؛} waps fibonacci (n - 1) + fibonacci (n - 2) ؛} fnkshn mymwiza (fn) {const cache = {} ؛wapsy fnkshn (... aarghs) {aghr (kyshay [aarghs]) {waps kyshay [aarghs] ؛} kanstngh ka ntyjha = fn.apply (yha ، aarghs) ؛kyshay [aarghs] = ntyjha ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛} ؛} constimeizedfibonacci = memoize (fibonacci) ؛ knswl.lwgh (mymwizadafybwnyky (10)) ؛// aaؤt pt: 555 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum Fibonacci () fnkshn ko bhatr bnanay kay liye mymwaizayshn ka astamal karty hain ، jo Fibonacci trtyb main NTH nmbr ka hasab lghata haay۔mymwiza () fnkshn ayk dlyl kay tawr par ayk fnkshn lyta hay aur ayk nya fnkshn lwtata hay jo asal fnkshn kay ntaij ko kych krta haay۔kyshda ntaij kesi shay main mhafwza kyay jatay hain jsay kyshay kehty hayn۔jb yadghar fnkshn ko ayk hi dlail kay sath dwbarha blaya jata hay tou ، yeh is ki dwbarha ghnty kay bjaiay kychda ntyjha ko lwtata haay۔ yaddasht ayk taaktwr tknyk hay jo ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bna sakti hay ، khasa tawr par jab bar bar aur bhary kmpywtngh afaal sy nmtnay kay۔mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko haasal karnay aur un ko waps karnay sy jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha pysh kya jata hay tou ، mymwaizayshn prwsysngh kay wkt ko kam krskty hay aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔ khlasaha main ، yaddasht jawa askrpt main ayk aysy tknyk hay js main mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko kych karna aur un ko waps karna shaml haay۔jb wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha hawta haay۔mymwraizayshn ko fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay aur ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnanay kay liye astamal kya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par jab bar bar aur bhary kmpywtngh afaal sy nmtnay kay liay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt kwkyza main kwkyza ko snbhalnay wali chhwty tykst failyn hain jo kesi wyb srwr kay zaryaha saarf kay kmpywtr par mhafwza hawty hayn۔wha saarf ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، jesay lagh un ki asnad ، trjyhaat ، aur shapngh kart aaitmza۔jawa askrpt main ، kwkyza ko kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykay 123456 ka astamal karty hoey kwkyza ko snbhala jaskta haay۔ kwkyza ko snbhalnay kay liye dstawyzaat kwky praprty ko kis tarah astamal kryn: kwky trtyb dyna: kwky syt karnay kay liye ، dstawyza ko kwky praprty ko strngh wylyw tfwyzu kryn۔tar farmyt nam = kdr main hona chahaiay ؛ myaad khtm hawjata hay = tarykh ؛ rastha = rastha ؛ dawmyn = dawmyn ؛ mhafwza۔nam aur kdr kay pyramytrza ki zurwrt hay ، jabky myaad khtm hony ، rastha ، dawmyn aur mhafwza pyramytrza akhtyary 123456.docament.cookie = "saarf nam = jan daw ؛ myaad khtmyan = thu ، 22 jwlaiy 2023 12:00:00 UTC ؛ rastha =/"؛ is msaal main ، hum nay ayk kwky ka nam saarf nam jan daw wylyw kay sath rakha haay۔kwky 22 jwlaiy ، 2023 ko khtm ho rahi hay ، aur jra kay rastay sy kabl rsaiy haay۔ kwky ko ghyt krna: kwky haasal karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahyn۔praprty safhaha par dstyab tamam kwkyza ka ayk tar waps krty hay ، jsay symywlwnza 123456.CONST kwkyza = dstawyza daat kwky ؛ knswl.lagh (kwkyza) kay zaryaha alag kya jata haay۔ is msaal main ، hum dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahtay hain aur ntyjha ko knswl par lagh un karty hayn۔kwky ko hazaf krna: kwky ko hazaf karnay kay liye ، myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko mazuy ki tarykh main taay kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum 1 jnwry 1970 ko myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko trtyb dy kar saarf nam kwky ko hazaf karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، kwkyza chhwty tykst failyn hain jo kesi wyb srwr kay zaryaha saarf kay kmpywtr par mhafwza hawty hayn۔jawa askrpt main ، kwkyza ko dstawyza daat kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey snbhala jaskta haay۔kwky syt karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty ko strngh wylyw tfwyzu kryn۔kwky haasal karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahyn۔kwky ko hazaf karnay kay liye ، mazuy ki tarykh ki myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko mkrr kryn۔jawa askrpt main bohat sy aam kamwn kay liye kwkyza kay sath kam karnay ka tarykha smjhna zurwry hay ، jesay saarf ki twsayk ، zaaty nwayt ، aur trykngh۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrptyn jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan frk ، msawat ki janch pratal kay liye do mwazanha aaprytrza hayn: == aur ===۔aghrchha dono aaprytrza msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، un kay darmiyan ayk khasa frk haay: dabl brabr (==) aaprytr: dabl brabr aaprytr ayk tjrydy msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad krta haay۔aghr akdar mkhtlf aksam ki hain tou ، jawa askrpt mwazanha 123456.console.log (2 == "2") bnanay sy pehlay ayk ya dono akdar ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (0 == "") ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (null == ghair mtaynha) ؛// aaؤt pt: yeh msaal kay tawr par ، dabl brabr aaprytr drst waps aajata hay kywnkha mwazanha hony sy pehlay 2 ko astrngh "2" main tbdyl kya jata haay۔ trpl brabr (===) aaprytr: trpl brabr aaprytr ayk skht msawat mwazanha aaprytr haayyha un ki aksam ko tbdyl kyay baghair msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr akdar mkhtlf aksam ki hain tou ، mwazanha ghalat 123456.console.log (2 === "2") lwtata haay۔// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (0 === "") ؛// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (null === ghair mtaynha) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، trpl kay brabr aaprytr ghalat ko lwtata hay kywnkha awpryynda kay dayta ki aksam mkhtlf hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh dabl brabr aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad mwazanha krta haay۔، jabky trpl brabr aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo un ki aksam ko tbdyl kyay baghair msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔mwsar aur mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye un dono aaprytrza kay mabyn akhtlafat ko smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh kis tarah aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta haay۔
Answer: jawa askrpt aur aabjykt wrasat main jawa askrpt main prwtw taip aabjykt ، prwtw taip aabjykt hr shay ki ayk pwshydha praprty hay jo is kay prwtw taip namy kesi aur shay sy lnk rkhty haay۔prwtw taip aabjykt ka apna ayk prwtw taip hay ، aur isi tarah jab tak kesi chyza ko is kay prwtw taip kay tawr par kaladm kay sath nahin phanch jata haay۔yha prwtw taip chyn 123456 kay nam sy jana jata haay۔ jab koi shay tyar ki jati hay tou ، is ko is kay prwtw taip aabjykt sy khsawsayat aur tarykay wrasat main mltay hayn۔asay aabjykt wrasat kay nam sy jana jata haay۔aghr kesi praprty ya tarykha kar par hi koi chyza nahin mlty hay tou ، jawa askrpt prwtw taip chyn ko is wkt tak dykhta hay jab tak keh isy praprty ya tarykha kar ya tarykha kar nah mil jaiay۔ is ki ayk msaal hay keh prwtwtaip aabjykt ko aabjykt ki wrasat kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay: fnkshn shkhsa (nam ، amr) {this.name = nam ؛this.age = amr ؛} shkhsay۔ prwtwtaip۔ ghryt = fnkshn () {knswl.lagh (`haylw ، mera nam $ {yha haay۔ nam} aur main $ {this.age} sal ki amr main hawn۔)} ؛}؛ fnkshn taalb alm (nam ، amr ، myjr) {shkhsa۔ kal (yha ، nam ، amr) ؛this.major =} taalb alm.prwtwtaip = aabjykt.kryt (shkhsa.prwtwtaip) ؛ taalb alm.prwtwtaip.kwntrktr = taalb alm ؛ taalb alm.prwtaip۔ astwday = fnkshn () {knswl.lwgh (`myn mtaalaha kar raha hon $ {yha is ka mtaalaha kar raha hawn.major} .`) ؛} ؛ kanst jan = nya taalb alm ('jan' ، 20 ، 'kmpywtr sains') John jan.ghryt () ؛// aaؤt pt: 'haylw ، mera nam jan hay aur main 20 sal ka hawn۔// aaؤt pt: 'myn kmpywtr sains ka mtaalaha kar raha hawn۔' is msaal main ، hum ayk shkhsa knstrktr fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk nam aur amr pyramytr lyta haay۔ham shkhsay prwtw taip aabjykt main ayk mbarkbad () tarykha shaml karty hayn۔as kay bad hum ayk taalb alm knstrktr fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk nam ، amr aur ayk aham pyramytr lyta haay۔ham kal () ka tarykha astamal karty hain takha is klydy lfza ko taalb alm aabjykt par syt kya jaiay۔as kay bad hum ayk nya astwdant prwtwtaip aabjykt bnatay hain jo aabjykt ka astamal karty hoey shkhsay prwtw taip aabjykt sy wrasat main mlta haay۔ kryt () tarykha۔aakhr main ، hum talbaa kay prwtw taip aabjykt main ayk mtaalaha () ka tarykha shaml karty hayn۔ khlasaha ، prwtw taip aabjykt jawa askrpt main hr shay ki ayk pwshydha praprty hay js main kesi aur shay ka lnk hay js ko is kay prwtw taip kaha jata haay۔prwtwtaip aabjykt aabjykt wrasat kay liye astamal hawta hay ، jahan koi shay is kay prwtw taip aabjykt sy khsawsayat aur tarykwn ko wrasat main mlty haay۔jawa askrpt main pychydha ، aabjykt par mbny ayply kyshnza bnanay kay liye prwtw taip aabjykt kay sath kam karnay ka tarykha smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrptysynkrwns tkrar main ghair mtzalzal tkrar jawa askrpt main ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko ghair mtzalzal aadad wa shmar kay zaraia ، jesay nyt wrk ki drkhwastwn ya fail sstm ki karrwaiywn ko ayk trtyb war andaza main tkrar karnay ki ajazat dyty haay۔ghyr mtzalzal tkrar ko lwp kay liye bhaaؤ ka astamal karty hoey nafza kya jata hay ، jo lwp 123456 kay liye ayk mtzuad wrzen haay۔ yahan asnkrwns fnkshn ko snbhalnay kay liye awwr aaf lwp ko kis tarah astamal karnay ki ayk msaal haay: async fnkshn* asyncgenerator (){pydawar 1 ؛pydawar 2 ؛pydawar 3 ؛} async fnkshn myn () wait antzaar kay liye (asyncgenerator ()) {console.log (kdr) ؛}}mrkzay()؛// aaؤt pt: 1 ، 2 ، 3 main is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk ghair mtzalzal jnrytr fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain js ko asyncgenerator () kaha jata hay js sy tyn akdar mlty hayn۔as kay bad hum ayk Async fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain js ko myn () kehty hain jo asyncgenerator () kay zaryaha haasal krdha akdar par tkrar karnay kay liye bhaaؤ kay lwp ka astamal krta haay۔aghly kymt par janay sy pehlay hr kymt ko hal karnay kay liye lwp kay liye antzaar kay antzaar myn۔as ka astamal kesi bhi shay kay sath kya jaskta hay jo ghair mtzalzal tkrar prwtwkwl ko nafza krta hay ، js kay liye shay ki zurwrt hawty hay keh woh ayk [alamt.asaitrytr] tarykha ho jo ayk mtzuad Iterator aabjykt ko lwtata haay۔ghyr mtzalzal aytrytr aabjykt ka aghla () tarykha hona zurwry hay jo praprtyza wylyw kay sath kesi shay kay liye wadha lwtata hay aur kya jata haay۔ khlasaha main ، asynkrwns tkrar jawa askrpt main ayk khsawsayt hay jo dawylprza ko trtyb war aadad wa shmar kay zaraia ko trtyb denay ki ajazat dyta haay۔ghyr mtzalzal tkrar ka atalak lwp kay liye awwr aaf lwp ka astamal karty hoey kya jata hay ، jo lwp ka ayk mtzuad wrzen haay۔ghyr mhafwza lwp ka astamal un chyzawn par tkrar karnay kay liye kya jata hay jo asynkrwnws aytryshn prwtwkwl ko nafza karty hain ، js kay liye is chyza ki zurwrt hawty hay js main ayk [alamt.asaitrytr] tarykha hawta hay jo ayk ghair mtzalzal Iterator aabjykt ko waps krta haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltayan kya hayn؟aam ghltay ki aksam ki msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrptja askrpt kwda main ghltaywn ki aksam mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn ka samna kar sakti hain jab isy phansy di jati haay۔ghltayan prwghramngh ki ghltaywn ، ghalat un pt ، ya dyghr ghair mtwka wakaat ki wjha sy hawskty hayn۔jawa askrpt main ghltaywn ki mkhtlf aksam yeh hayn: nhaw ki khraby: nhaw ki ghltayan is wkt hawty hain jab jawa askrpt kwda ko sahayha tarykay sy nahin lkha jata hay ، jesay ghmshdha brykt ، symykwlwn ya kwsyn۔talyf kay mrhalay kay doran jawa askrpt anjn kay zaryaha nhaw ki ghltaywn ka ptha chlta hay aur kwda ko rnngh 123456.console.log ('haylw ، wrlda!' 'say rwkta haay۔lykn aalan nahin kya gaya hay ya is sy bahar nahin haay۔ amldraamd kay mrhalay kay doran hawalha ki ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko rnngh 123456.console.log (fw) sy rwkta haay۔mtwka ksm ka nahin hay ، jesay kesi ghair mtaynha mtghyr par kesi tarykha ko kal karnay ki kwshsh krna۔ aml kay mrhalay kay doran ksm ki ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko rnngh 123456.const fw = ghair mtaynha ؛ foo.touppercase () ؛ // ksm ki khraby sy rwkta haay۔ghyr mtaynha tawr par ghltay par twppr kys () ko kal nahin krsktay hayn: rynj ki ghltayan is wkt hawty hain jab koi kymt mtwka had kay andr nahin hawty hay ، jesay mnfy lmbaiy kay sath sray bnanay ki kwshsh krna۔ amldraamd kay mrhalay kay doran rynj ki ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko rnngh 123456.NEW sy rwka jata haay۔srny (-1) ؛// rynj ki khraby: ghalat srny lmbaiy sy mtalk ghltay: tshkhysa ki ghltayan is wkt hawty hain jab aywl () fnkshn ko ghalat tarykay sy astamal kya jata hay ، jesay jawa askrpt kwda kay ghalat tar ko ghzarna۔talyf kay mrhalay kay doran tshkhysay ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko rnngh 6. yw aar aai ki ghltay sy rwkta haay: yw aar aai ki ghltayan is wkt hawty hain jab aalmy staha par yw aar aai hayndalngh fnkshn ghalat tarykay sy astamal hawta hay ، jesay ankwdawry () ya daykwdawry () afaal ko ghalat yw aar aai kay tar ko mntkl krna۔amldraamd kay mrhalay kay doran yw aar aai ki ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko rnngh 5 sy rwkta haay۔ andrwny ghltay: dakhly ghltayan is wkt hawty hain jab jawa askrpt anjn ko dakhly ghltay ka samna karna prata hay ، jesay mymwry ya astyk ki jghha khtm hawjaty haay۔amldraamd kay mrhalay kay doran dakhly ghltaywn ka ptha lghaya jata hay aur kwda ko chlanay sy rwkta haay۔jawa askrpt main mkhtlf ksm ki ghltaywn ko smjhna mwsar aur mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye zurwry haay۔

Question: jawa askrpt main yaddasht kay tsawr ki wzuahat karain aur yeh keh fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay kay liye kis tarah astamal kya jaskta haay۔
Answer: jawa askrpt mymwzaaizayshn main mymwraizayshn jawa askrpt main ayk asalaha ki tknyk hay jo mhanghay fnkshn kalwn kay ntaij ko mhafwza krty hay aur jab wahi aadanwn kay dwbarha waka hawty hay tou kyshda kay ntaij ko lwtata haay۔dwsray lfzawn main ، mymwraizayshn kesi fnkshn ko tyza karnay ka ayk tarykha hay jo is kay pehlay hasab shuda ntaij ko astwr krkay aur un ko waps karnay ki bjaiay is ko waps karnay ki bjaiay jab bhi fnkshn ko isi dlail kay sath blaya jata haay۔yadghar fnkshn: ayk yadghar fnkshn bnanay kay l we ، hamain kesi kyshay aabjykt ki wzuahat karnay ki zurwrt hay jo pchhly fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko zakhyrha kray ghy۔as kay bad hum ayk nya fnkshn waps karty hain jo chyk krta hay keh aya kyshay aabjykt main pehlay sy dyiay gaye un pt ka ntyjha mwjwd haay۔aghr ntyjha kyshay main mil jata hay tou ، hum isy lwtatay hayn۔bsawrt dyghr ، hum ntyjha ki ghnty karty hain aur isy waps karnay sy pehlay kyshay aabjykt main astwr karty hayn۔wapsy ka fnkshn (... aarghs) {kwnt klyd = json.Stringify (args) ؛aghr (kyshay [klyd]) {waps kyshay [klyd] ؛} kanstngh ka ntyjha = fnk.apyply (yha ، aarghs) ؛kyshay [klyd] = ntyjha ؛wapsy ka ntyjha ؛} ؛} fnkshn fibonacci (n) {aghr (n <= 1) {wapsy n ؛fib fibonacci (n - 1) + fibonacci (n - 2) ؛} constimeizedfibonacci = memoize (fibonacci) ؛ knswl.lagh (mymwizadafybwnaky (10)) ؛// aaؤt pt: 555 is msaal kay tawr par ، hum ayk mymwiza () fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo ayk fnkshn ko dlyl kay tawr par lyta hay aur ayk nya fnkshn lwtata hay jo asal fnkshn kay ntaij kych krta haay۔kyshda ntaij kesi shay main mhafwza kyay jatay hain jsay kyshay kehty hayn۔jb yadghar fnkshn ko ayk hi dlail kay sath dwbarha blaya jata hay tou ، yeh is ki dwbarha ghnty karnay kay bjaiay kychda kay ntaij ko lwtata haay۔mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko haasal karnay aur un ko waps karnay sy jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha pysh kya jata hay tou ، mymwaizayshn prwsysngh ka wkt kam krskty hay aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔kyshda ntyjha jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha hawta haay۔mymwraizayshn ka astamal fnkshn par aml draamd ko bhatr bnanay aur ayply kyshnza ki karkrdghy ko nmayan tawr par bhatr bnanay kay liye kya jaskta hay ، khasa tawr par jab bar bar aur bhary kmpywtngh kay afaal sy nmtnay kay liay۔mhanghay fnkshn kalza kay ntaij ko haasal karnay aur un ko waps karnay sy jab wahi aadanwn ko dwbarha pysh kya jata hay tou ، mymwaizayshn prwsysngh kay wkt ko kam krskty hay aur saarf kay tjrbay ko bhatr bna sakti haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main kwkyza ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟dstawyza kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔ kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt kwkyza main kwkyza ko snbhalnay wali chhwty tykst failyn hain jo kesi wyb srwr kay zaryaha saarf kay kmpywtr par mhafwza hawty hayn۔wha saarf ki malwmat ko zakhyrha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، jesay lagh un ki asnad ، trjyhaat ، aur shapngh kart aaitmza۔jawa askrpt main ، kwkyza ko dstawyza daat kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey snbhal liya jaskta haay۔ kwkyza ko snbhalnay kay liye dstawyzaat kwky praprty ka astamal kesay kryn: kwky trtyb dyna: kwky syt karnay kay liye ، dstawyza ko kwky praprty ko strngh wylyw tfwyzu kryn۔tar farmyt nam = kdr main hona chahaiay ؛ myaad khtm hawjata hay = tarykh ؛ rastha = rastha ؛ dawmyn = dawmyn ؛ mhafwza۔nam aur kdr kay pyramytrza ki zurwrt hay ، jabky myaad khtm hony ، rastha ، dawmyn aur mhafwza pyramytrza akhtyary 123456.docament.cookie = "saarf nam = jan daw ؛ myaad khtmyan = thu ، 22 jwlaiy 2023 12:00:00 UTC ؛ rastha =/"؛ is msaal main ، hum nay ayk kwky ka nam saarf nam jan daw wylyw kay sath rakha haay۔kwky 22 jwlaiy ، 2023 ko khtm ho rahi hay ، aur jra kay rastay sy kabl rsaiy haay۔ kwky ko ghyt krna: kwky haasal karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahyn۔praprty safhaha par dstyab tamam kwkyza ka ayk tar waps krty hay ، jsay symywlwnza 123456.CONST kwkyza = dstawyza daat kwky ؛ knswl.lagh (kwkyza) kay zaryaha alag kya jata haay۔ is msaal main ، hum dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahtay hain aur ntyjha ko knswl par lagh un karty hayn۔kwky ko hazaf krna: kwky ko hazaf karnay kay liye ، myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko mazuy ki tarykh main taay kryn۔msaal kay tawr par ، hum 1 jnwry 1970 ko myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko trtyb dy kar saarf nam kwky ko hazaf karty hayn۔ khlasaha main ، kwkyza chhwty tykst failyn hain jo kesi wyb srwr kay zaryaha saarf kay kmpywtr par mhafwza hawty hayn۔jawa askrpt main ، kwkyza ko dstawyza daat kwky praprty aur kwky hayra phyry kay tarykwn ka astamal karty hoey snbhala jaskta haay۔kwky syt karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty ko strngh wylyw tfwyzu kryn۔kwky haasal karnay kay liye ، dstawyza daat kwky praprty prahyn۔kwky ko hazaf karnay kay liye ، mazuy ki tarykh ki myaad khtm hony waly pyramytr ko mkrr kryn۔jawa askrpt main bohat sy aam kamwn kay liye kwkyza kay sath kam karnay ka tarykha smjhna zurwry hay ، jesay saarf ki twsayk ، zaaty nwayt ، aur trykngh۔

Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrptyn jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan frk ، msawat ki janch pratal kay liye do mwazanha aaprytrza hayn: == aur ===۔aghrchha dono aaprytrza msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، un kay darmiyan ayk khasa frk haay: dabl brabr (==) aaprytr: dabl brabr aaprytr ayk tjrydy msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad krta haay۔aghr akdar mkhtlf aksam ki hain tou ، jawa askrpt mwazanha 123456.console.log (2 == "2") bnanay sy pehlay ayk ya dono akdar ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay ki kwshsh krta haay۔// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (0 == "") ؛// aaؤt pt: trueconsole.log (null == ghair mtaynha) ؛// aaؤt pt: yeh msaal kay tawr par ، dabl brabr aaprytr drst waps aajata hay kywnkha mwazanha hony sy pehlay 2 ko astrngh "2" main tbdyl kya jata haay۔ trpl brabr (===) aaprytr: trpl brabr aaprytr ayk skht msawat mwazanha aaprytr haayyha un ki aksam ko tbdyl kyay baghair msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔aghr akdar mkhtlf aksam ki hain tou ، mwazanha ghalat 123456.console.log (2 === "2") lwtata haay۔// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (0 === "") ؛// aaؤt pt: falseconsole.log (null === ghair mtaynha) ؛// aaؤt pt: is msaal kay tawr par ، trpl kay brabr aaprytr ghalat ko lwtata hay kywnkha awpryynda kay dayta ki aksam mkhtlf hayn۔ khlasaha yeh keh dabl brabr aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad mwazanha krta haay۔، jabky trpl brabr aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo un ki aksam ko tbdyl kyay baghair msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha krta haay۔mwsar aur mwsar jawa askrpt kwda lkhnay kay liye un dono aaprytrza kay mabyn akhtlafat ko smjhna zurwry haay۔

Question: aap jawa askrpt main mtzuad tkrar ko kis tarah snbhaltay hayn؟wyw aaf lwp kay astamal ki wzuahat kryn۔

ki janch pratal kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf tarza aml hayn۔dwnwn aaprytrza kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr (==): == aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad krta haay۔== aaprytr aapryt kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr nahin krta haay۔yha sirf chyk krta hay keh aya akdar brabr hain ya nhayn۔ console.log (2 == "2") ؛// trueconsole.log (0 == "") ؛// trueconsole.log (null == ghair mtaynha) ؛// trueconsole.log ([] == "") ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، == aaprytr drst lwtta hay kywnkha mwazanha sy pehlay aap ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl kya jata haay۔ msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr (===): === aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha baghair kesi aam ksm main tbdyl krta haay۔=== aaprytr aapryt kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr krta haay۔yha chyk krta hay keh aya akdar aur dayta ki aksam brabr hain ya nhayn۔ console.log (2 === "2") ؛// falseconsole.log (0 === "") ؛// falseconsole.log (null === ghair mtaynha) ؛// falseconsole.log ([] === "") ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، === aaprytr jhwtay lwtta hay kywnkha awprydas main mkhtlf aadad wa shmar ki aksam hawty hayn۔ khlasaha ، == aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad mwazanha krta hay ، jbkha=== aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko aam ksm main tbdyl kyay baghair mwazanha krta haay۔=== aaprytr astamal karnay main zayada skht aur mhafwza hay kywnkha yeh awpyrynda kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr krta haay۔ghyr mtwka ntaij sy bchnay kay liye == aaprytr kay bjaiay === aaprytr ko astamal karnay ki sfarsh ki jati haay۔ zaraia: https: Question: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan kya frk haay؟frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye msaalyn fraham kryn۔
Answer: jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan frk == aur === aaprytrza jawa askrpt main do akdar ka mwazanha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔aghrchha dono aaprytrza msawat ki janch pratal kay liye astamal hawtay hain ، lekin un kay mkhtlf tarza aml hayn۔dwnwn aaprytrza kay mabyn akhtlafat yeh hayn: khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr (==): == aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad krta haay۔== aaprytr aapryt kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr nahin krta haay۔yha sirf chyk krta hay keh aya akdar brabr hain ya nhayn۔ console.log (2 == "2") ؛// trueconsole.log (0 == "") ؛// trueconsole.log (null == ghair mtaynha) ؛// trueconsole.log ([] == "") ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، == aaprytr drst lwtta hay kywnkha mwazanha sy pehlay aap ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl kya jata haay۔ msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr (===): === aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr haay۔yha msawat kay liye do akdar ka mwazanha baghair kesi aam ksm main tbdyl krta haay۔=== aaprytr aapryt kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr krta haay۔yha chyk krta hay keh aya akdar aur dayta ki aksam brabr hain ya nhayn۔ console.log (2 === "2") ؛// falseconsole.log (0 === "") ؛// falseconsole.log (null === ghair mtaynha) ؛// falseconsole.log ([] === "") ؛// is msaal kay tawr par ، === aaprytr jhwtay lwtta hay kywnkha awprydas main mkhtlf aadad wa shmar ki aksam hawty hayn۔ khlasaha ، == aaprytr ayk khlasaha msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko ayk aam ksm main tbdyl karnay kay bad mwazanha krta hay ، jbkha=== aaprytr ayk skht msawat ka mwazanha aaprytr hay jo msawat kay liye do akdar ko aam ksm main tbdyl kyay baghair mwazanha krta haay۔=== aaprytr astamal karnay main zayada skht aur mhafwza hay kywnkha yeh awpyrynda kay dayta ki aksam par ghwr krta haay۔ghyr mtwka ntaij sy bchnay kay liye == aaprytr kay bjaiay === aaprytr ko astamal karnay ki sfarsh ki jati haay۔ zaraia: [ayjwkytw.yw] 1 liye == aaprytr chyk krta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh dono ataraf main mtghyr ya akdar ko ayk hi dayta rkhnay ki zurwrt nahin haay۔har bar taip karain ، yany ، yeh chyk krta hay keh kya baien taraf sy Answer: jawa askrptyn jawa askrpt main == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan frk ، == aur === aaprytrza msawat kay l two do akdar ka mwazanha karnay kay liye astamal hawtay hayn۔== aaprytr ko khlasaha msawat aaprytr kaha jata hay ، jabky === aaprytr ko skht msawat aaprytr kaha jata haay۔yhaan dono aaprytrza kay mabyn klydy akhtlafat hayn: == aaprytr taip jbr anjam dyta hay ، js ka mtalb hay keh yeh aap ko mwazanha karnay sy pehlay aap ko aam ksm main tbdyl krta haay۔=== aaprytr taip jbr anjam nahin dyta hay aur is ki zurwrt hawty hay keh woh ayk hi ksm ki haw۔== aaprytr sy zayada mhafwza aur zayada kabl aatmad smjha jata hay kywnkha yeh ghair mtwka ksm kay jbr sy prhayza krta haay۔ yahan == aur === aaprytrza kay darmiyan frk ko wazuha karnay kay liye kuch msaalyn hayn: jawa askrpt hay kywnkha is kay liye dono ko ayk hi ksm ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ dusri msaal main ، == aaprytr ghalat ko waps krta hay kywnkha yeh ksm ka jbr anjam dyta hay aur "2" ko "2" ko nmbr 2 main tbdyl krta Question: taip askrpt ka astamal karty hoey antyjrza ki saf par bainry tlash karnay kay liye ayk prwghram lkhyn۔
Answer: taip askrpt bainry tlash main antyjrza ki ayk saf par bainry tlash karna ayk srch alghwrthm hay jo aadad wa shmar ki trtyb shuda saf main kesi kdr ki haysayt ko tlash krta haay۔ayk trtyb shuda srny aur ayk hadf ki kymt kay pysh nzar ، bainry srch srny ko do partyshnwn main twra dyty hay aur hadf ka mwazanha hr partyshn main drmyany ansar sy krty haay۔aghr yeh hadf kay brabr hay tou phir yeh un dono pwzayshnwn main sy kesi ayk main hay ، bsawrt dyghr ، bainry srch yeh ntyjha akhza krskty hay keh hadf ki kymt un do partyshnwn main sy ayk main hogi jo abhi tlash ki jaskty haay۔ yahan ayk saf par bainry tlash karnay kay liye kuch hakmt amly hayn۔taip askrpt main antyjrza ka: tkrary nktaha nzar: tkrary nktaha nzar main saf kay zaryaay tkrar karna aur hadf ki kymt ka mwazanha srny kay drmyany ansar sy karna shaml haay۔aghr hadf ki kymt drmyany ansar sy kam hay tou ، srny kay baien nsaf hasaay main tlash jary rhaty haay۔aghr hadf ki kymt drmyany ansar sy zayada hay tou ، srny kay dien nsaf hasaay main tlash jary rhaty haay۔as nktaha nzar kay liye do pwaintrza ko tryk rkhnay ki zurwrt haay: kam pwaintr aur aaly pwaintr۔ ryfrsyw nktaha nzar: tkrar nktaha nzar main sray ko do hasawn main tksym karna aur hadf ki kymt ka mwazanha srny kay drmyany ansar kay sath karna shaml haay۔aghr hadf ki kymt drmyany ansar sy kam hay tou ، srny kay baien nsaf hasaay main tlash jary rhaty haay۔aghr hadf ki kymt drmyany ansar sy zayada hay tou ، srny kay dien nsaf hasaay main tlash jary rhaty haay۔as nktaha nzar kay liye tkrar ko rwknay kay liye ayk bys kys ki zurwrt hawty hay aur srny ko do hasawn main tksym karnay kay liye ayk bar bar aanay wali kal ki zurwrt hawty haay۔ yahan tak keh tkrary nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey taip askrpt main antyjrza ki saf par bainry tlash karnay ka tarykha yeh haay: taip askrpt fynkshn bainry srch (nmbr: srny <<<nmbr> ، klyd: nmbr): nmbr {km = 0 ؛chlyn aaly = nums.length - 1 ؛jbkha (km <= aaly) {aaiyay mda = ryazuy۔ flwr ((km + aaly) / 2) ؛if (nums [wsta] === key) {waps wsta ؛} if (key> nums [wsta]) {km = wsta + 1 ؛} else {aaly = wsta - 1 ؛}} rytrn -1 ؛} is msaal main ، hum ayk bainry srch fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo nmbrwn ki ayk saf aur ayk hadf ki kymt ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur saf main hadf ki kymt ka asharyha waps krta haay۔ham kam pwaintr ko 0 aur aaly pwaintr ko srny kay aakhry andayks ki taraf shrwa karty hayn۔as kay bad hum thwray dyr ka astamal karty hoey saf kay zaryaay tkrar karty hain aur farmwlay (km + haaiy) / 2 ka astamal karty hoey mda andayks ka hasab ktab krkay srny kay drmyany ansar kay sath hadf ki kymt ka mwazanha karty hayn۔srny ، hum mda andayks lwtatay hayn۔aghr hadf ki kymt saf kay drmyany ansar sy zayada hay tou ، hum nay kam pwaintr ko wsta + 1 par syt kya۔hadf ki kymt saf main nahin paiy jati hay ، hum -1 ko waps karty hayn۔ yahan tak keh tkrar nktaha nzar ka astamal karty hoey taip askrpt main add ki ayk saf par bainry tlash karnay kay tarykha ki ayk msaal haay: taip askrpt fnkshn bainry srch (nmbr: srny <nmbr> ، klyd: kam nmbr ، kam kam ، kam ، kam ، kam ، kam ، kam ، kam nmbr ، kam nmbr ، kam nmbr ، kam ، km: nmbr = 0 ، aaly: nmbr = nums.length - 1): nmbr {if (km> zayadha) {wapsy -1 ؛mid mda = ryazuy۔ flwr ((km + aaly) / 2) ؛if (nums [wsta] === key) {waps wsta ؛} if (key> nums [wsta]) {bainry srch (nmbr ، klyd ، wsta + 1 ، aaly) lwtaiyn۔} dusri {bainry srch (nmbr ، klyd ، kam ، wsta - 1) ki wapsy ؛}} is msaal main ، hum ayk bainry srch fnkshn ki wzuahat karty hain jo nmbrwn ki ayk saf ، ayk hadf ki kymt ، ayk kam pwaintr ، aur ayk aaly pwaintr ko dlail kay tawr par lyta hay aur saf main hadf ki kymt ka asharyha waps krta haay۔ham kam pwaintr ko 0 aur aaly pwaintr ko srny kay aakhry andayks tak shrwa karnay kay liye pehlay sy taay shuda pyramytrza ka astamal karty hayn۔ham ayk bys kys ki wzuahat karty hain jo kam pwaintr aaly pwaintr sy zayada hawta hay tou tkrar ko rwkta haay۔as kay bad hum farmwlay (km + haaiy) / 2 ka astamal karty hoey mda andayks ka hasab lghatay hain aur hadf ki kymt ko saf kay drmyany ansar sy mwazanha karty hayn۔aghr hadf ki kymt saf kay drmyany ansar kay brabr hay tou ، hum mda andayks ko lwtatay hayn۔aghr hadf ki kymt saf kay drmyany ansar sy zayada hay tou ، hum bar bar bainry srch fnkshn ko `mda + kay sath kehty hayn۔
